loans.name: Sen's Group

texts.en: A local resident from Kampong Cham province, Sen is 49 years old and has four children. Rainy season rice cropping on one hectare of farmland and a paid job at a construction site are the main sources of her family’s income to deal with their financial burden. This business earns her about 38,900 Cambodia riels (KHR) per day after several years involvement in the current business. Now, Sen leads a group of two to get a second loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s field partner); both of them have fully repaid their past loans. As a leader she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed for replanting. She hopes to grow her rice on time so that she can make more profit to keep supporting her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seed for replanting.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Mamlakat

texts.ru:
Мамлакат очень жизнерадостная и трудолюбивая женщина в возрасте 50 лет. Она замужем и имеет на иждевении троих детей. Сама она работает вот уже как 10 лет учительницей в средней школе. Она всегда мечтала дать своим детям достойное образование и старается делать всё возможное чтобы её дети этого достигли и стали образованными людьми. Муж и старший сын Мамлакат работают строителями, от этого дела они получают хороший доход. 

Сейчас другой сын Мамлакат поступил в университет, и они должны оплатить обучение за первый год его обучения там. Но у Мамлакат на сегодня не имеется такой большой суммы, чтобы сразу заплатить. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд, где узнала что есть возможность получить кредит на образование. Мамлакат желает получить кредит для оплаты обучения своего сына. Она очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Mamlakat is a very cheerful and hard-working woman who is 50 years old.  She is married with three children and she has worked for ten years as a high school teacher.  She has always dreamed of giving her children a good education and she tries to do everything she can to achieve this goal for her children so they will become educated people.  Mamlakat's husband and elder son work in construction and they make a good income.

Now her other son has been accepted at university and they have to pay for his first year's tuition, but Mamlakat doesn't a large enough sum of money to be able to pay for it all at once.  This is why she has turned to Arvand, where she heard that it is possible to get a loan for tuition.  Mamlakat would like to receive this loan to pay for her son's tuition.  She is counting on a successful loan application and she thanks Arvand in advance for their financial support.

loans.use: to pay for her son's tuition.

loans.name: Muribat

texts.ru:
Мурибат позитивная и трудолюбивая женщина в возрасте 56 лет. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей, которые создали уже свои семьи и живут отдельно. Живёт она в небольшом сельском посёлке. С детства Мурибат мечтала стать учительницей, но так сложились обстоятельства, что она не смогла получить высшего образования из-за финансовой недостаточности в семье. Сразу после окончания средней школы Мурибат выдали замуж. И так она стала домохозяйкой. Но, даже находясь постоянно  дома,  Мурибат никогда не сидит без дела. Она вместе с мужем стараются делать всё возможное, чтобы обеспечивать себя всем необходимым.

Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Мурибат вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются животноводством. Она выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса Мурибат получает хороший доход. Муж Мурибат также работает в местной мастерской и  его работа приносит дополнительный доход в семью. Их совместного дохода хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Мурибат с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Мурибат заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество её жизни.
texts.en:
Muribat is a positive and hard-working woman.  She is 56 years old and married with two children, who have already live on their own and have started their own families.  Muribat lives in a small village and she has dreamed of becoming a teacher since she was a child, but because of her difficult circumstances and her family's financial shortcomings, she was not able to receive a higher education.  She married immediately after high school and became a housewife, but even though she is always at home, Muribat is never idle.  She and her husband try to do whatever they can to make sure their needs are met.

In order to maintain a steady stream of income for their daily needs, Muribat and her husband have started their own business raising livestock.  She raises the livestock and then sells their milk and butter.  Muribat makes a decent income from this business.  Her husband works as a handyman and his income brings in a bit extra to the family.  Their combined income is enough to keep them living at an average level, but they don't yet have enough to take care of all of their needs.  At the moment, Muribat and her husband want to increase the head of livestock they raise.  For this reason, she has turned to Arvand to get a loan to purchase cattle.  She thanks Arvand in advance for their support, which makes it possible for her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Silvia Teodora

texts.es:
Silvia vive en Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas ciudad de la región costa, con un clima agradable. Es una ciudad muy comercial la misma que es considerada puerto terrestre que une a la sierra y a la costa. Silvia tiene 36 años, vive con sus dos hijitas, las dos estudian en una escuela cercana al sector y por las tardes pasan en casa de su abuelita quien las cuida ya que Silvia trabaja en un local en el centro.
Silvia es padre y madre para sus pequeñas, ha tenido que salir adelante sola ya que su ex esposo se fue a otra ciudad y las dejó. Silvia arrienda un pequeño local en el centro de la ciudad donde tiene su negocio, hace más de tres años se ha dedicado a la venta de ropa de fiesta para niños y adultos, todos los días trabaja incansablemente por llevar un sustento a su hogar.
Silvia con este crédito desea invertirlo en la compra de más mercadería, como vestidos de novia y ropa de bautizo para niños, con ello mejorarán sus ventas ya que tiene mucha clientela que le solicita este tipo de vestimenta.
Se siente feliz ya que con este crédito podrá mejorar sus ventas y brindar más variedad a sus clientes; agradece a kiva y a Fundación Alternativa por darle la oportunidad que en otros lugares no pudo recibir.
texts.en:
Silvia lives in Santo Domingo de los Tsachiles, a coastal city with a pleasant climate. It is a commercial city, considered a land port that connects the mountains and coast. 

Silvia is 36 years old, and lives with her two young children--they both study in a nearby school. In the evenings, they spend time at their grandmother's house, who helps to watch them while Silvia works in the town center. Silvia plays the father and the mother for her children--she has had to cope by herself, as her ex-husband left her and moved to another city.

Silvia rents a small shop in the town center where she has her business. For more than three years, she has made a living by selling formal clothes for kids and adults. She works tirelessly every single day to bring home enough to sustain her household.

With this loan, Silvia wants to invest in purchasing more merchandise, such as wedding dresses and children's christening clothes. By purchasing these items, she will be able to increase her sales because many of her customers ask for this kind of clothing. She is happy that this loan will allow her to improve her sales and provide more variety to her customers. She is grateful to KIVA and Fundacion Alternativa for giving her an opportunity she would not be able to receive elsewhere.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to supply her  business.

loans.name: Shahlo

texts.ru: Шахло 30-летняя жительница сельского района Кубадиён. Ее муж уехал на заработки в Россию, оставив тут жену с двумя детьми. Шахло трудно без мужа, но она вынуждена смириться, так как муж наконец-то работает и высылает деньги. Сама Шахло тоже не сидит без дел. Она уже два года как занимается собственным торговым бизнесом. Она занимается куплей и продажей миндаля. Миндаль она закупает оптом из сел и близлежащих деревень, и затем продает на рынках своего района. Шахло берет кредит, чтобы купить партию миндаля для перепродажи. Она нуждается в этом кредите для развития своего дела и ожидает поддержки.
texts.en: Shahlo is 30 years old and she lives in the village of Qubadiyon.  Her husband has gone to work in Russia, leaving his wife and two children behind.  It is difficult for Shahlo without her husband, but she has had to come to terms with the fact that her husband has finally found work and is able to send money home.  Shahlo doesn't sit idly - she has been running her own business for two years, buying and selling almonds.  She buys almonds wholesale from her village and surrounding villages and then she sells them on at the markets in her region.  Shahlo is asking for a loan to buy a wholesale lot of almonds for resale.  She needs this loan to increase her business and she is counting on your support.

loans.use: to buy almonds for resale.

loans.name: Sok's Group

texts.en:
Residing in the Ek Phnom district of Battambang province, Sok is 37 years old and has five children, three of whom are in school. To deal with her family’s hardship, she grows rice on two hectares of farmland and has a fish catching business. To supplement her income, she works at a construction site during her spare time. 

This is the fourth loan for Sok with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The past loans, which she has fully repaid, allow her to uplift her lifestyle at a gradual pace. Now she leads a group of four to get a new loan. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizers, insecticides, seeds for her agribusiness and to buy fishing tools to support her fish catching business. She hopes that she can make more income than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides, seeds for her agribusiness and to buy fishing tools to support her fish catching business.

loans.name: Srim's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer from Kampong Cham province, Srim is 54 years old and married. She is blessed with three kids. She overcomes her family's hardship by growing rice crops as her single source of income. She can currently earn up to 29,000 KHR per day. 

This is Srim's second microloan with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. She has repaid back her past loan completely and it has gradually improved her lifestyle. She is now teaming up with a group of two to get a new loan. Srim, who is the group leader, will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer for her crops. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her crops.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Kunthea's Group

texts.en:
Originally from Battambang province, Kunthea is a mother in her early 30s and has two children who are too young for schooling. Her entire household solely counts on cassava and rice cropping and her husband's occupation as a motorbike repairer. 

Now, she leads a group of four to get a new loan. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy seeds and to pay for plowing fees. She hopes that she can make more income than before.

loans.use: to buy seeds and to pay for plowing fees.

loans.name: Roeurn's Group

texts.en:
A local villager from Battambang province’s Bovel district, Roeurn is a widow and has three children. As a single parent who is the breadwinner in the family, she grows rice and works for others for a fee during her spare time. 

Now, she is in need of financial support for her cash-crop. Hence, she teamed up with a group of four others to get a new loan. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to pay for plowing fees. She hopes to prepare her farmland on time so that she can replant her crop seasonably.

loans.use: to pay for plowing fees.

loans.name: Leopoldo

texts.es:
Leopoldo de 56 años de edad, estudio hasta 3º grado de educacion básica, esta soltero, tiene una hija pero no viven en casa con él y esta pequeña. 

Leopoldo trabaja la agricultura lo ha hecho por mas de 20 años, lo aprendio de sus hermanos mayores y de su padre y decidio dedicarse a este trabajo porque obtiene granos basicos para su alimentacion y tiene alimento para el ganado, porque tambien tiene esa actividad economica. 

Antes por un tiempo se dedico a motorista. Su lugar donde trabaja esta como a 2 km y viaja a pie o en caballo. Nadie de la familia se involucra en sus trabajos. Su horario es de 6:00 am a 12:00 md y de 2:00 pm a 6:00 pm. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar semilla de maíz, abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas y herbicidas. Con el crédito le mejorara mucho porque tendra granos basicos y ademas alimento para el ganado y por lo tanto su condicion de vida sera mejor.
texts.en:
Leopoldo, 56, studied up till the third grade of elementary school. He is single and has a little daughter, but she does not live with him.

Leopoldo has worked in agriculture for more than twenty years. He learned this activity from his older brothers and from his father. He decided to work with this because he can grow his own food and feed for his animals, which are another source of income for him. He has also worked as a driver.

Leopoldo walks or rides a horse for 2 km (1.2 miles) to go to work. He works alone, from 6:00 am till 12:00 pm and from 2:00 pm till 6:00 pm. He is requesting a loan at CREDICAMPO to buy corn seeds, compost, fertilizers, pesticides and herbicides. This loan will be of great help for him, since he will have food for him and his animals, which will help him improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizers, pesticides and herbicides.

loans.name: Roeurn's Group

texts.en: A local villager from Battambang Province’s Bovel District, Roeurn, is a widow and has three children. As a single woman who is the breadwinner in the family, she grows rice and works for others for a fee during her spare time. In addition to her business loan, she leads the same team to get a consumption loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). For Roeurn, who is the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy a household appliance for her family. She hopes to provide her family with sufficient necessities.

loans.use: To buy a household appliance for her family.

loans.name: Jérusalem Group

texts.fr: Miderho est membre du banque villageoise Jérusalem, cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 41 ans, mère de 10 enfants dont 9 vont  à l’école et 1 encore gosse. Elle a commencé son petit commerce avec de fonds de reçu de son mari. Elle est vendeuse de souliers usagés, elle va acheter 1 ballon de souliers. Son conjoint exerce un service de gardiennage dans une organisation de la place. Elle souhaite obtenir plus des crédits pour accroitre son chiffre d’affaires, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: Miderho is a member of the Jerusalem Group, a client of IMF Hekima. She is married, 41 years old, and mother of 10 children, nine of whom attend school while one is still too young.  She started her business with funds from her husband. She sells used shoes and she will buy one bundle of shoes.  Her spouse is a security guard at a local organization. She wants to obtain more loans to increase her revenues and to pay for the school fees and food of her children.  Finally, she thanks Hekima for their support of entrepreneurs not served by traditional banks.

loans.use: to buy one bundle of shoes.

loans.name: Ouindinmanegde Group

texts.fr:
Mme BINTA est la représentante du groupe OUINDINMANEGDE. Elle se porte bien. Mariée, elle est mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 13ans et le moins âgé a 04ans. 03 vont à l’école. Elle a 04personnes en charge.
Mme vend des objets plastiques(plats,seaux,etc.)  depuis 06ans. Elle s’approvisionne au  marché de son secteur.
Elle veut s’acheter  10seaux en plastiques, 10 de plats en plastique.
Mme veut épargner ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne  s’acheter une parcelle et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en: Ms. Binta is the representative of the Ouindinmanegde Group. She is doing well. She is married and mother of three children; the oldest is 13 and the youngest is 4. Three of the children attend school. She has four dependents.  Ms. Binta has been selling plastic goods (plates, buckets, etc.) for six years.  She buys her supplies at the market in her area.  She wants to buy 10 plastic buckets and 10 plastic plates. She wants to save her profits. Her goal is to buy  a plot of land and improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy 10 plastic buckets and 10 plastic plates.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to finish his university degree by studying abroad.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise and be able to diversify her business.

loans.name: Ngowa Group

texts.fr: Aldegonde est présidente du groupe de crédit Ngowa, mariée, âgée de 49 ans, mère de 10 enfants qui tous vont  à l’école, cliente de l’IMF Hekima. Elle a commencé son commerce avec de fonds de reçu de son grand frère. Elle vend de nappes préfabriquées à son domicilie. Elle va acheter les fils de raphia. Son conjoint est un menuisier. Elle souhaite obtenir plus des crédits pour accroitre son chiffre d’affaires, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: Aldegonde is the president of Ngowa Group. She is married, 49 years old, and mother of 10 children who all attend school. She is a client of IMF Hekima.  She started her business with funds from her older brother.  She sells prefabricated cloth from her home.  She will buy raphia yarn. Her husband is a carpenter.  She wishes to obtain more loans to increase her revenue and pay for her children's food and school fees. Finally, she thanks Hekima for their support of entrepreneurs not served by traditional banks.

loans.use: to buy raphia yarn.

loans.name: Norman Ulises

texts.es:
El joven Norman Ulises Alas tiene 26 años de edad, reside en casa de sus padres en el Progreso, Yoro.
Es e profesión Ingeniero Civil, joven que desea seguir superándose de manera profesional, para lograr muchos propósitos en su vida.
Norman se describe como una persona persistente, capaz de fijar sus metas de vida, luchar por lograrlas y mantenerse constante.
Pro-activo: trata de dar un paso adelante y tomar responsabilidades cada vez mas grandes para poder dar soluciones a los problemas que se presentan hoy en día, también considera que es un joven con iniciativa ya que le gusta destacarse en sus actividades profesionales o académicas.
Su motivación para continuar estudiando, es aumentar sus conocimientos en diferentes áreas ya sean administrativas, financieras y de negocios para aplicarlas en su trabajo, en su profesión y en futuro en su propia empresa.
El quiere contribuir al desarrollo de su país, sirviendo de ejemplo a los demás jóvenes para que estos tengan el deseo de superarse y luchar por sus sueños y metas en donde puedan aplicar sus habilidades de diferentes maneras profesionales.
Para Norman el poder brindar un apoyo a la educación a todos los jóvenes, significa una gran oportunidad que nadie debe dejar pasar.
Para sus planes Norman desea la felicidad personal considerando a Dios como el centro de su vida y el de su futura familia, también desea ser un empresario de éxito.
texts.en:
Young Norman Ulises Alas is 26 years old and lives in his parents' house in Progreso, Yoro.

He is in the civil engineering profession and wants to continue improving himself professionally, to achieve many goals in his life.

Norman describes himself as a persistent person, capable of focusing on his life goals, fighting to achieve them, and keeping himself consistent.  He is also proactive and tries to take a step forward and take on more and more responsibility to be able to solve problems that appear these days. He also believes that he is a young man with initiative since he likes to stand out in his professional and academic work.

His motivation to continue studying is to increase his knowledge in different areas such as administration, finance, and business to apply it to his work and, in the future, to his own business.

He wants to contribute to his country's development, serving as an example to other young people so that they have the desire to improve themselves and fight for their dreams and goals where they can apply their various professional skills.

For Norman, the ability to offer support for the education of all the young people means a great opportunity that no one should let pass by.

For his plans, Norman wants personal happiness, considering God as the center of his life and of his future family. He also wants to be a successful businessman.

loans.use: to undertake his masters degree.

loans.name: Pascual

texts.es:
La necesidad de  seguir adelante en la vida ha llevado a Pascual de 59 años de edad casado, a aprender algunos oficios.  A través de los años se ha dedicado a vender medicina y poner sueros a los enfermos, el tiene siete hijos 3 de ellos ya están casados y los cuatro son estudiantes destacados en una escuela de su comunidad donde viven.  

Los créditos que se le han otorgado anterior mente le han sido de gran utilidad para  la ampliación de su venta de medicina, por medio de ello el a obtenido grandes logros en la vida. Antes cuando no tenia acceso a créditos el no podía comprar sus medicinas para venderlas.
	
Además de que la gente lo busca para sus medicinas, existen otras personas que lo buscan para que les haga alguna costura ya que también Pascual es costurero y es agricultor en su bella comunidad y es un claro ejemplo de que si uno se propone realizar varias actividades en la vida una lo puede lograr.

Se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para ampliar su negocio de venta de medicina que es su servicio para las personas.  Además que le gustaría seguir apoyando a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The need to get ahead in live has brought Pascual, 59 years old and married, to learn several jobs. Throughout the years he has worked selling medicine and administering IVs to sick people. He has seven children, three of them are married and the four who are students stand out in a school in the community where they live. 

The loans that he has been given before have been a great help to expand his medicine sales, through them he has gotten great success in life. Before when he didn't have access to loans, he couldn't purchase the medicines to sell them.

In addition to people seeking him out for his medicine, there are others who look for him so that he will make them some clothing since Pascual is also a tailor and is a farmer in his lovely community and is a clear example that if one decides to do various jobs in life, one can achieve them.

He has seen it necessary to apply for a loan to expand his business selling medicines that is a service for people. In addition, he would like to continue supporting his children.

loans.use: to purchase medicine.

loans.name: Jose Guillermo

texts.es:
El joven José Motiño,tiene 24 años de edad y vive con sus padres en la colonia Honduras, ciudad de Tegucigalpa.
Esta por finalizar sus estudios universitarios, donde espera titularse de licenciado en mercadotecnia.
José Guillermo se considera una persona líder, capaz y luchadora al momento de alcanzar sus metas. 
El motivo principal para continuar con sus estudios ,es alcanzar el éxito personal y profesional logrando así que su familia lo considere un ejemplo a seguir, el considera que la mejor manera de contribuir al desarrollo de su país es mantener una actitud y pensamientos totalmente positivos, buscando soluciones ante problemas que en la actualidad representan una serie de obstáculos para muchas personas.
José Guillermo se desenvuelve en actividades que evalúan el proceso de toma de decisiones de las empresas ante situaciones diarias, el comenta que no todas las empresas reaccionan de manera favorable.
El brindar un apoyo a la educación, para José es de gran importancia ya que hay jóvenes que desean superarse y hoy en día los motivos económicos impiden el logro de sus metas.
El desea alcanzar el éxito profesional mediante el profesionalismo y así brindarle una mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Young José Motiño is 24 years old and lives with his parents in the Honduras section of the city of Tegucigalpa. He is about to finish his university studies where he expects to earn a degree in marketing. Jose Guillermo is thought of as a leader, and a person who is determined and capable of reaching his goals. 

His main motivation for continuing his studies is to achieve personal and professional success, serving as an example for his family to follow. He believes that the best way to contribute to the development of his country is to always think and act in a totally positive way, looking for solutions to problems that currently pose a series of obstacles for many people. 

Jose Guillermo is involved in activities that evaluate companies' decision making processes on daily situations and states that not all companies react 
favorably. He wants to support education; this is very important to Jose because there are young people who want to better themselves, but today economic factors often get in the way of their ability to achieve their goals. He hopes to attain success by becoming a professional, thus being able to provide a better education for his children.

loans.use: to finish his university studies.

loans.name: Marisa

texts.es: Marisa de 53 años de edad  es madre soltera y vive con su hijo de 16 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se gana la vida desde hace 40 años con la venta de tamales de diferentes especialidades como: elote y pollo, además vende sopa de pata los fines de semana. Marisa desea cambiar las láminas de las paredes de su vivienda, ya que como se observa en la fotografía, estas se encuentran bastante deterioradas. Por lo anterior solicita a FUSAI un crédito para comprar: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar las láminas de las paredes de su vivienda.
texts.en: Marisa is 53 years old. She is a single mother who lives with her 16 year old son. She is an enterprising woman who has earned her living for 40 years selling different types of tamales, such as  corn and chicken. She also sells sopa de pata on the weekends. Marisa wants to change the sheeting on the walls of her home. As can be seen in the photograph, they are very deteriorated. Because of this, she has asked FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized sheeting, wood and nails to change the sheeting on the walls of her house.

loans.use: to buy sheeting, wood and nails to change the sheeting on the walls of her house.

loans.name: Sarun's Group

texts.en:
A father of four children, Sarun is 55 years old and married. He lives in Battambang province where he grows cassava. Besides his agribusiness, he also earns a small income via his occupation as a government officer. 

Due to the lack of financial support for his cash crop, he joined a group of two to get a new loan. As the group leader, he will use his full portion of the loan to pay for plowing fees, buy cassava seedlings and pay for labor costs. He hopes that he will enjoy a greater yield than before.

loans.use: To pay for plowing fees, buy cassava seedlings and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Many's Group

texts.en:
Many, age 55 and a widowed mother of four children, is a villager from Battambang province. Presently, only one child remains in school.  She supports the basics for her family via her clothes tailoring business, which she has been doing for 10 years. 

This is the fifth loan for Many, and sixth loan for her co-borrower, in the same group of two with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid back her past loan completely, and now her living condition is getting better than before. 

Now she is a leader of her group. Many she will spend her entire loan portion to buy a sewing machine to support her business. 

She hopes that she can make more income so that she can keep her child in school.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine to support her business.

loans.name: Enrique

texts.es:
Al trabajar la tierra bajo un sol agotador sin embargo dispuesto a sudar todo el tiempo para brindarle un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Enrique de 36 años de edad casado, el motivo por el cual el está impulsado en realizar otro préstamo es para una nueva inversión el cultivo de papas.

Los préstamos eran con otras instituciones, pero no contaban con los beneficios que nos da adicla como lo es la forma de pago, intereses mensuales y el capital al vencimiento pus son beneficios que nos ayudan a soñar en un futuro mejor para nuestros futuros hijos.

El uso respectivo que don Enrique le dará el segundo crédito es para la compra de semillas de papa y abonos orgánicos para poder empezar a cultivar más productos para luego venderlas en el mercado de su comunidad y así obtener una ganancias para el sustento de su familia y para que tengan las condiciones de vida adecuada. 

El cambio que realiza un crédito es principalmente asegurar  la cosecha con los insumos y el manejo en general de las cosechas agrícolas, para que las personas obtengan productos de la mejora calidad y es lo que a ocurrido con don Enrique que por medio de los prestamos que se les a concedido el a podido obtener mejores cosechas.

Una de las metas de el es la construcción de casas para sus hijos para una condición de vida adecuada y estudios para sus hijos para que se conviertan en profesionales en la vida y seguir cosechando las tierras fértiles de su comunidad.
texts.en:
He works the land under an exhausting sun, willing to sweat to offer his children a better future. Enrique is 36 years old and married. That is why he is motivated to take out another loan. It is for a new investment in the potato crop. 

He had loans with other institutions, but they didn't have the benefits that ADICLA has, like the payments, monthly interests and the capital at maturity. These are benefits that help us dream of a better future for our future children. 

The use Enrique will have for the second loan is to buy potatoes seeds and organic fertilizer to be able to start growing more products to later sell in the market in his community. This way, he can obtain profits to support his family so they can have adequate living conditions. 

The change that the loan will bring is mainly to ensure the harvest with the materials and general management of the harvests, People can obtain better quality products and what has happened with Enrique is that with the loans he has been able to obtain better harvests. 

One of his goals is building houses for his children for adequate living conditions and education for his children so that they can have good professions in life and keep harvesting the fertile land in his community.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and chemical fertilizer.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos es una estudiante de Derecho, actualmente vive con sus padres, trabaja en una lomiteria como cocinero por las noches y por las tardes estudia en la universidad para ser abogado.
Su objetivo con este préstamo es pagar sus cuotas del semestre para poder culminar la carrera y convertirse en un flamante abogado luchador de la justicia de los derechos humanos. Sueña desempeñarse con lealtad y honestidad en lo que involucra su carrera y más adelante ser un Fiscal.
texts.en:
Carlos is a law student. He lives with his parents. At nights, Carlos works as a cook at a pork restaurant and, in the afternoons, he is studying to be a lawyer.

Carlos will use this loan to pay tuition fees for this semester in order to finish his degree and become a brilliant human rights lawyer. Carlos wants to be loyal and honest in his career. In the future he would like to work for the state prosecutor's office.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Mosoq Allpa Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “MOSOQ ALLPA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ana ella es casada y tiene 48 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de accesorios para carros como parabrisas, llantas y faroles, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de accesorios para carros. La socia solicita el crédito para parabrisas, faroles y llantas.

Los socios que estan pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de computadoras, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the "Mosoq Allpa" communal bank in the Cusco district of the Cusco province and Cusco department.

Ana, one of the members, is 48 years old and married. She has four children and works at her business selling items - such as windscreens, tyres and headlamps - for cars. Ana works from 8am until 8pm. She has had the business for eight years and it is going very well for her. Ana's dream is to expand her business. She is applying for this loan in order to buy windscreens, headlamps and tyres.

In the image, the members in the separate photos were unable to attend the meeting when the group photo was taken as they were working.

Aside from Ana, the other members of the group have various businesses, including: selling computers, a grocery store, and a restaurant.

Ana is grateful to those who are helping her dreams by providing this loan. She promises to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy windscreens, headlamps and tyres.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
Luz es una persona buena, sus padres son personas de carácter tranquilos que siempre le apoyaron en llegar a su meta, que es la de ser un profesional en el área de salud, que es lo que le gusta y así ayudar a sus padres. 
Su aspiración es terminar su carrera y empezar a trabajar en el rubro. Está estudiando la Carrera de enfermería.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas, y así seguir trabajando por su meta como lo viene hacienda.
texts.en: Luz is a good person. Her parents are peaceful people who have always supported her in reaching her goal, which is to become a heath care professional. That is what she likes and this way, she can help her parents. Her goal is to finish her major and works in that area. She is studying nursing. She is asking for this loan to be able to pay for her tuition so that she can keep working toward her goal as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay for college tuition.

loans.name: Dieu Merci Group

texts.fr: Jeve est commerçante, présidente du groupe de crédit Dieu Merci, cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 40 ans, mère de 12 enfants qui tous vont à l’école. Elle a commencé son petit commerce avec de fonds de reçu de son mari. Elle est vendeuse des denrées alimentaires sur la route secondaire. Elle va s’approvisionner en pommes de terre, huile de palme et végétale. Son conjoint est un maçon. Elle souhaite obtenir plus des crédits pour accroitre son chiffre d’affaires, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: Jeve is a vendor, the president of the Dieu Merci credit group and a client of IMF Hekima. She is a married mother to 12 children, who are all receiving an education. She started her small business with funds she received from her husband. She sells foodstuffs by the roadside. She wishes to purchase potatoes, palm oil and vegetables. Her partner works as a builder. She hopes to be able to obtain further loans in order to grow her business, as well as feed and educate her children. Finally, she would like to thank Hekima for the support they give to entrepreneurs who are excluded from the traditional banking system.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of potatoes, palm oil and vegetables

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials for work as a mechanic.

loans.name: Pov's Group

texts.en:
Pov, a mother of five children, is 46 years old and a villager from the Bovel district of Kampong Cham province. She supports her family via rice farming and maize cropping. She works for others for a fee. She has been involved in her current business for 10 years.  

Now in a group of two, she is a leader and she will spend her entire loan portion to pay for the plowing fee. 

She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To pay for the plowing fee.

loans.name: Nayorn's Group

texts.en:
A villager from Kampong Cham province, Nayorn is 42 years old and a mother of four children. Her main sources of income are from rice cropping and Krama weaving. She has been occupied in the current business for 22 years, earning about 29,000 KHR per day. 

This is her first loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She forms a group of two to get a new loan. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, rice seed, pay for the labor cost for her farming business, and to buy thread to weave more Krama cotton scarves. 

She hopes to gain good sales from her business so that she can make more income.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, rice seed, pay for the labor cost for her farming business, and to buy thread to weave more Krama cotton scarves.

location.town: Prey Veng Province, Sithor Kandal district

loans.name: Marcelo

texts.es:
La agricultura es una actividad solamente apta para toda aquella persona que ama la tierra como a una madre, como una engendradora de futuros para la vida.  Buenos futuros de esperanzas para generaciones siguientes. Es el trabajo de don Marcelo de 38 años de edad  casado y cuenta con 3 hijas y 2 hijos todos ellos son estudiantes en la escuela de su comunidad.
	
La actividad que don Marcelo realiza es la siembra de: papas, zanahorias, frijol y maíz. Dicha actividad lo realiza en su comunidad donde el vive, sus productos lo comercializa en el mercado local de Sololá el eligió esta actividad porque cuenta con conocimiento de manejo en las hortalizas que lo heredo de su padre. La segunda actividad que el realiza es jornalero en su comunidad.

El uso que don Marcelo le dará al crédito es para la compra de semillas de papa y abonos químicos e orgánicos para que su producción se de papas se buena este año.  Uno de los grandes sueños de el es la construcción de unos cuartos para sus hijos y para que ellos tengan las condiciones de vidas adecuadas y ver que sus hijos se conviertan en profesionales en el futuro.
texts.en:
Agriculture is an activity suited only to those who love the earth as a mother and as a provider of future life - a good future full of hope for coming generations. This is Don Marcelo's work. He is a married man of 38 years old who has three daughters and two sons. His children are all students at the school in their community.

Don Marcelo plants potatoes, carrots, beans, and maize. He does this activity in the community where he lives and he sells his products in the local market of Sololà. He chose this work because he inherited a good knowledge of vegetables from his father. His second activity is as a day labourer in his community.

Don Marcelo will use this loan to purchase potato seeds as well as chemical and organic fertilizers so that he has a good potato harvest this year. Some of his biggest dreams are to build some rooms for his children and to provide them with adequate living conditions. He would like to see his children grow into professionals in the future.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds as well as organic and chemical fertilizers.

loans.name: Sopheak's Group

texts.en: Sopheak, who is age 38 and married, is a local villager from the Kampong Cham province where her rice and cassava are grown. To supplement her income, Sopheak works for others for a fee. Sopheak and her two co-borrowers, who have never been with VisionFund (Kiva’ s partner) before, join the same group to get a new loan. As the group's leader, Sopheak will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizers and pay the plowing and transplanting fees. Sopheak hopes that she can gain a better yield than she did before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and to pay the plowing and transplanting fees.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose vive con sus familiares, las metas que se propone son de poder terminar la carrera con éxito primeramente y luego ser un profesional competente en el área de ingeniería industrial. De aquí al futuro se ve en alguna empresa nacional estando al mando de grandes obras.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas, y así seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo, luchando por sus metas.
texts.en:
Jose lives with his relatives.  The goals that he has are, first, to successfully get his degree, and then to be a competent professional in the field of industrial engineering.  In the future he sees himself in a national business in charge of great works.

He is requesting this loan in order to be able to make his payments.  This way he will continue studying as he has been doing and struggling to reach his goals.

loans.use: to make university payments.

loans.name: Mab's Group

texts.en:
Originally from Kampong Cham province where her rice is grown, Mab is a 58-year-old mother of four children. Besides her agribusiness, she works for others for a fee to supplement her income. This business has returned her about 31,000 KH per day. Mab, the first-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), forms a group of three to get a new loan. 

As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, rice seed, and to pay for the plowing fee. She hopes to gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, rice seed, and to pay for the plowing fee.

location.town: Prey Veng Province, Sithor Kandal district

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria tiene tres hermanos, está estudiando la carrera de derecho, espera graduarse para poder ejercer y ganar su propio dinero. 
Ella quiere formar su propia familia, ser alguien de bien en la sociedad, y a través de su estudio ayudar a los demás.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, para poder cubrir sus gastos de la carrera.
texts.en:
Maria has three siblings.  She is studying law.  She hopes to graduate in order to be able to exercise the profession and earn her own money.

She wants to start her own family, to a good member of society, and to help others through her education.

She is requesting this loan to be able to make her university payments and to be able to cover her educational expenses.

loans.use: to make university payments.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia actualmente Trabaja en un hospital en el Departamento de Admisión. Ella tiene como Objetivo llegar a culminar sus estudios en Kinesiologa y Fisioterapeuta para así poder llegar a su Meta que es tener su propio Negocio de Kinesiologia y Fisioterapia y poder llegar a salir Adelante para también cumplir su sueño de tener una Familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas de la carrera, y así seguir detrás de sus sueños.
texts.en:
Sonia currently works in the admissions department of a hospital.  Her objective is to complete her studies in kinesiology and physical therapy.  She wants to do this in order to be able to reach her goal of having her own kinesiology and physical therapy business.  She wants to be able to get ahead in order to also fulfill her dream of having a family.

She is requesting this loan to make her educational payments.  This way she will continue to follow her dreams.

loans.use: to make her university payments.

loans.name: Pov's Group

texts.en:
Pov, a local resident from Kampong Cham province, is 33 years old and married. She has three kids, all of whom remain in school. She has been occupied in the current business for 13 years, earning about 13,300 KHR per day. 

Now she is need of financial support for her agribusiness. Therefore, she approaches VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) by forming a group of two. She is a leader. 

She will spend her entire loan portion to pay for the plowing fee for her crop. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To pay for the plowing fee for her crop.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: Jose es soltero no tiene hijos y vive con su madre en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento donde paga un anticretico Jose tiene un cargo de Subgerente Comercial en una empresa pequeña y necesita un prestamo para hacer mantenimiento a su vehiculo que es usado para transportarse a su oficina, llevar a su madre para sus quehaceres y otras tareas Jose es la unica fuente de ingresos en el hogar y es necesario que el carro este en buen estado
texts.en: Jose is single, has no children and lives with his mother in La Paz.  They live in a brick and cement house where he pays an antichresis.  Jose works as a commercial assistant manager in a small firm and he needs a loan to maintain his car which he uses for get to the office, to take his mother out to do errands and for other duties. Jose provides the household's only income and he needs his car to be in good condition.

loans.use: to maintain his car

loans.name: Srors' Group

texts.en:
A villager from Kampong Cham province, Srors is 20 years old and single. He makes a living via rice cropping on a one hectare of farmland and his paid working job at a construction site. Since he has a shortage of loan capital to support his agribusiness, he forms a group of three to get a new loan. 

As the leader, he will spend his entire loan portion to buy fertilizer for his crop. He hopes to gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her crop.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Sopheakna's Group

texts.en:
Sopheakna, a young mother of one kid residing in Kampong Cham province, is 20 years and supports her living via rice cropping on a half hectare of farmland. Her husband also helps her to earn more income via working as blacksmith. The average income that she has received is around 35,000 KHR per day. 

Now she is in need of working capital for her farmland. Therefore, she leads a group of three to get a new loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner).  Sopheakna, the group leader, will spend her entire loan portion to pay for a plowing fee and to buy fertilizer for her crop. 

She hopes to gain double the income than before.

loans.use: to pay for a plowing fee and to buy fertilizer for her crop.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Engsan's Group

texts.en:
An inhabitant from Kampong Cham province, Engsan is 42 years old and married. She has five children, four of whom still count on her, as one is too young for schooling, and three are in school. The main sources of her family income are from rice cropping and the paid-work job at a rice mill factory. Her family can earn up to 31,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day after several years' involvement in the current business. 

Now, she leads a group of three to get a new loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), as each of them is in need of financial aid. For Engsan, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and insecticide, and to pay plowing fees. She highly hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and insecticide, and to pay plowing fees.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Soeurn's Group

texts.en:
Originally from the Dambae district of Kampong Cham province, Soeurn is a cassava grower who is one of the breadwinners in the family consisting of six children. Currently, two out of her six children are in school. Her single source of income, about 26,400 KHR per day, is used to cover the daily food consumption and other necessities in her household.  

Now she teams up a group of two to get a new loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner).  As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and to pay for labor costs as well as reaping fees. 

She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, insecticide, and to pay for labor costs as well as reaping fees.

loans.name: Huon

texts.en:
Huon, a resident from Kampong Cham province, is 40 years old and has five children. Nowadays, four of her kids still need her support, as two are too young for schooling and two are living with her and help the family’s business as well as do household chores.  Her entire family relies on beans and rice farming. The business that she has occupied for 20 years has returned her about USD 7.5 per day.  

This is not the first loan for Huon with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid back her past loan completely, and it has provided a decent income for her family to buy sufficient food for her kids. 

Now she takes a new loan in order to buy fertilizer and seed for replanting. She hopes that her beans and rice will grow health, so that it will return her a good yield with high income.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seed for replanting.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
Gustavo es un joven de 26 años, vive con sus hermanos, comenta que sus padres son separados, está estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas, y comenta que se ve como alguien independiente, de aquí a tres años más con bases fuertes para enfrentar los desafíos cotidianos.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Gustavo, age 26, lives with his siblings.  He states that his parents are separated.  He is studying for a degree in business administration.  He says that he see himself as someone who is independent.  In three more years he sees himself as having a strong base for facing daily challenges.

He is requesting this loan to be able to make his university payments.  This way he will be able to continue with his education as he has been doing.

loans.use: to make his university payments.

loans.name: Khoeurn's Group

texts.en:
Khoeurn, a villager from Battambang Province’s Moung Russey district, is 24 years old and married.  She is a farmer who does rice cropping as the main source of income. During the spare time, she works for others for a fee to supplement her income. 

Now, in a group of two, she is a leader of her first microloan group with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). For Khoeurn, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her crop. She hopes to gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and pesticides for her crop.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis estudia la carrera de Contabilidad, cuenta con un negocio de alquiler de vehículos, además de eso comenta que es padre de familia, tiene dos hijos y su señora es azafata y de esa forma se ayudan todos.
Su sueño es ser un buen profesional y de esa forma poder administrar bien su negocio para poder seguir creciendo.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir las cuotas de su carrera y así seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Luis is studying accounting, and has a car rental business.  He also says he is a father, has two children, and his wife is a flight attendant.  Thus, everyone helps.

His dream is to become a good professional and be able to manage his business well so that it can continue growing.  Luis asks for this loan so that he can cover the fees of his college course, and thus continue studying as he has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Chhorn's Group

texts.en:
A local resident from Battambang province, Chhorn is 52 years old and a married mother of 10 children. She supports her big family via cassava farming and her occupation as a local schoolteacher. She has been involved in the current business for several years, and it has earned her a decent income to support her lifestyle. 

Chhorn has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for ages, and it has upgraded her lifestyle more than before. Now, in a group of three, she is a leader. For Chhorn, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy insecticide for her crop. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy insecticide for her crop

loans.name: Chek's Group

texts.en: A widowed mother of five children who lives in the Kampong Cham province, Chek is 58 years old and married.  She overcomes her family’s financial burden via cassava farming and a coconut-trading business. Now, she is short the working capital to support her business. Therefore, Chek is applying for a new loan by forming a group of two with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). As the leader, Chek will spend her entire loan portion to pay for the weeding fee and to buy fertilizers for her cassava. Chek strongly believes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To pay the weeding fee and to buy fertilizers for her cassava.

loans.name: Sokhom's Group

texts.en:
A 52-year-old mother of six children, Sokhom is the breadwinner for her family, which struggles to survive. Sokhom earns a living via a fish-catching business and her day job. Her fish-catching business has generated about 40,000 KHR per day for her. 

Now, Sokhom has formed a group of two to request a new loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) as first-time borrowers. For Sokhom, the group leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy a cast net and other fishing tools to support her fish-catching business. Sokhom strongly hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy a cast net and other fishing tools to support her fish-catching business.

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Saram's Group

texts.en: Saram, originally from Battambang province, is 48 years old and a married mother blessed with four kids. For the sake of her entire family, she grows rice as a single source of income. Including this new loan, she has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for the past six loan cycles with successful repayment. Now, in a group of two, she is a leader. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed for her crop. She highly hopes that she can make more income to better her lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and rice seed

loans.name: Phorn's Group

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Phorn is age 59 years and married. She has four children.

To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice for 11 years and they supplement the family’s income by working for others for a fee. The current business earns them about 25,000 KHR per day and they manage to save about 15,000 KHR each day for future needs.
 
This is the fourth micro loan for Phorn’s group, consisting of four female members. She completely repaid the past loans, which have helped her make her living better. She is now leading her group to request a loan with VisionFund. As the leader, she wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland and use a portion of it to buy a water pump to supply water for her farming business. With this loan, she hopes to grow her business and earn a larger income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Yung's Group

texts.en: Yung, a citizen from Kampong Cham province, is 30 years old and blessed with two children; one is too young for schooling, and one is in school. She deals with her daily cost of living via cassava and rice cultivation. She has been occupied in the current business for several years, and now, she can earn up to 36,200 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day. Now, in a group of four, she is a leader. For Yung, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy potash and seed, and to plow her farmland. She hopes to gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy potash and seed, and to plow her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
Graciela se casó hace 6 años, está en cuarto año de la carrera contabilidad, aparte de estudiante soy peluquera, y por medio de ello se está ganando la vida y cubrir sus gastos.
Ella quiere ser una buena contadora para poder ayudar a su familia por medio de esos estudios. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas, y de esa forma poder seguir luchando por sus sueños.
texts.en:
Graciela got married six years ago.  She is in the fourth year of her degree in accountancy.  Apart from this, she works as a hairdresser, which allows her to generate an income to get along in life and take care of her expenses.

She wants to be a good accountant to be able to help her family through her studies. She is asking for this loan to pay her instalments, so she can continue to fight for her dreams.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Abrahan

texts.es:
Abrahan es estudiante, trabaja en una empresa privada como jefe de sucursal, es casado tiene una hija, estudia la carrera de Derecho.
Abrahan es una persona trabajadora, responsable y muy dedicada a sus estudios, desea salir adelante con sus esfuerzos para alcanzar sus objetivos. Su meta es de tener su título Universitario para poder trabajar de forma independiente y así sacar adelante a su familia que están muy esperanzados con él ya que es el sustento de la familia.
Pide este préstamo, ya que con el podrá pagar las cuotas de su universidad.
texts.en:
Abrahan is a student who also works in a private company as branch manager.  He is married with one daughter and is studying a degree in law.

He is a hard-working and responsible person who is very dedicated to his studies.  He wants to get ahead due to his efforts and reach his goals. His aim is to obtain a university qualification so he can work independently and provide for his family who are depending on him as he is the person who maintains them.

He is asking for this loan so that he can pay his fee instalments.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Rodrigo

texts.es:
Rodrigo comenta que sus metas son las de obtener un título universitario y tener su propia empresa en el futuro y ayudar a su familia en todo lo que pueda.
Quiere poder devolver a su familia todo lo que hicieron por él. Su aspiración es terminar su carrera y montar su propio consultorio, ya que está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería ambiental.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la carrera y así estar cada vez más cerca de su meta.
texts.en:
Rodrigo tells us that his aims are to obtain a university qualification and have his own company in the future so he can help his family in any way he can.

He wants to repay his family for all they have done for him. He dreams of finishing his degree and setting up his own practice as he is studying environmental engineering.

He is asking for this loan to be able to pay the fee instalments for his degree, which will bring him ever more close to his goal.

loans.use: to pay for university fees.

loans.name: Pov's Group

texts.en:
Pov, in her early 40s, is a mother of three children who resides in Kampong Cham province.

Pov is rice grower. She can earn up to 29,000 KHR per day after several years of involvement in her current business. Now, she leads a group of four to get a new loan. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy seed and fertilizer for her crop. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy seed and fertilizer for her crop.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Ren's Group

texts.en:
Ren is 63 years old and married. She has four children. 

She and her husband have worked very hard to support their family by farming rice for 30 years. The current business earns them about KHR 40,000 per day and they manage to save about KHR 20,000 each day after expenses. 

This is the first loan for Ren with VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to seek a loan. As the leader, she is going to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Maria Clemencia

texts.es: A sus 65 años de edad Clemencia juntamente con su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, la ganadería  y a la crianza de animales menores, ella tiene 5 hijas,un hijo mismos que ya son mayores de edad e independientes, Clemencia tiene una nieta de 6 años que es dcapacitada ya que a su edad no camina ni habla, Clemencia se dedica 20 años a la crianza  de chanchos, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de chanchos para mejorar su negocio, lo que Clemencia aspira es  trabajar mientras pueda, para no dar molestias a sus hijos y tener una vejez digna, pero la mas grande aspiracion de ella es que su nieta de 6 años que es discapacitada logre caminar y hablar.
texts.en: At the age of 65 Clemencia, together with her husband, works as a farmer, livestock owner and young animal caretaker. She has 5 daughters and one son who are all older and independent. Clemencia has one 6-year-old granddaughter who is disabled because at this age she cannot walk or talk. Clemencia has dedicated 20 years to raising pigs. She will invest this loan in the purchase of pigs to improve her business. Clemencia's aspiration is to work as long as she can to avoid bothering her children and to have a dignified old age. However, her greatest aspiration is that her 6-year-old granddaughter who is disabled will learn to walk and to talk.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Ry

texts.en:
Ry is aged 47 years and married with eight children. She is a farmer who has been growing rice and cassava for nine years to make a living, and she supplements the family’s income by working for others for a fee. With the current business, she can earn about 43,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day to meet the family’s needs, and is able to save about 20,000 KHR each day for the future needs. 

This is the first loan for Ry with VisionFund. She is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to grow her current business to earn a larger income, and also hopes to extend her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Mavelyn Yaneth

texts.es:
La Joven Mavelyn Yaneth tiene 25 años de edad, reside en Santa Lucia Francisco Morazán, en compañía de sus padres quienes se dedican a trabajos en casa.
Mavelyn se considera una joven responsable, honrada y con seriedad para afrontar sus compromisos y retos que se presentan en el diario vivir. Considera que la motivación para continuar estudiando es la competitividad ya que hoy en día el mundo se enfrenta a cambios constantes y la preparación profesional representa el medio de superación para cada una de las personas.
Mavelyn desea contribuir al desarrollo de su país, mediante la práctica y ejecución de sus conocimientos adquiridos a lo largo de toda su carrera, ya que es por eso que el mundo necesita de profesionales que puedan realizar cambios positivos y poder plasmarlos con iniciativa y conocimientos innovadores, desea darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia ya que ellos se han sacrificado porque nada le haga falta.
El apoyo a la educación es sinónimo de superación personal y de mucho compromiso para todos los jóvenes del mundo.
Tiene grandes sueños de convertirse en una empresaria exitosa en el área de mercadeo.
texts.en: Mavelyn Yaneth is a young woman of 25 who lives in Santa Lucia Francisco Morazán, along with her parents who work at home. Mavelyn considers herself a responsible, honest and serious young woman in the way she faces the obligations and challenges of everyday life. She says that she is motivated to continue studying by competitivity as the world now faces constant change and preparation for a professional career is the way for people to achieve something. Mavelyn wants to contribute to her country's development, by putting into action all the knowledge she has acquired throughout her course, as the world needs professionals who can bring about positive changes and do so with initiative and innovative expertise.  She wants to provide a better quality of life for her family because they have made sacrifices to ensure that she wants for nothing. Support for education is synonymous with personal development and a great deal of commitment for all the world's young people. She has a great ambition to become a successful businesswoman in marketing.

loans.use: to finish her university studies

loans.name: Pedrino

texts.es:
Pedrino, se decidió por un nuevo crédito para preparar la milpa de postrera (siembra de verano) e invertir en la tienda, comprara abono, insecticidas, semilla, para acondicionar el terreno y sembrar en el tiempo justo, así como también adquirirá mercadería para la tienda como jugos, pan, golosinas, aceite, huevos, etc., para mantener su negocio.
Con ayuda del préstamo anterior Pedrino ha mantenido la tienda y la venta de medicina natural funcionando, además también vende hamacas. Su situación económica es más favorable y le ha permitido cancelar la deuda adquirida.
texts.en: Pedrino has decided to request a new loan to prepare for the last corn crop (the winter season) and invest in his store. He will purchase manure, insecticides and seed to prepare the land and plant at the right time. He will also acquire merchandise for his store like juices, bread, sweets, oil, eggs, etc. to keep up his business. With the last loan Pedrino continued his store and the sale of natural medicine functioning and also sold hammocks. His economic situation is better and that allowed him to pay off his loan.

loans.use: to buy manure, insecticides, seeds ans to acquire merchandise for the store like bread, sweets, oil, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Amalia

texts.es: Amalia es soltera pero tiene dos hijos Amalia vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento donde paga un anticrético Amalia se gana la vida como secretaria y necesita un préstamo para pagar estudios superiores en secretariado ejecutivo Amalia es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Amalia is single, but she has two children. Amalia lives in La Paz in a brick and cement home where she pays for an antichresis mortgage. Amalia earns a living as a secretary and she needs a loan to pay for higher education expenses to become an executive secretary. Amalia is the only breadwinner in her home and because of this she needs your help.

loans.use: to pay for higher education expenses to become an executive secretary.

loans.name: Adolfo

texts.es:
Adolfo es médico, y se está especializando en Anestesiología, sus padres son comerciantes, y por medio del trabajo de ellos él ha podido terminar su carrera.
Él quiere ser un buen profesional, llegar a ser el mejor en su área, y contar con un consultorio propio.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su curso de especialización, y así poder cumplir su meta anhelada.
texts.en:
Adolfo is a doctor who is specializing in Anaesthesiology.  His parents are tradespeople and thanks to their hard work, he has been able to finish his degree course.

He would like to be a good professional and become the best in his area and have his own practice.

He is asking for this loan to be able to pay his instalments on his specialized course, so that he can fulfil his long-awaited dream.

loans.use: to pay fees on his specialized course.

loans.name: Lihun's Group

texts.en:
A villager from Siem Reap province, Lihun is 30 years old and a mother of five children. 

She meets the needs of her family via rice farming, the business that she has had for ages. Including this loan, she is in her second cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loan. Now, she leads a group of three to get a new loan. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer for her crop. She hopes that she can make more yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her crop.

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Phy

texts.en:
Phy is 27 years old and married with two children. She lives in a rural village of the Bovel district, where crop farming a common way to make a living. Like other villagers, rice farming and sesame growing have been her family’s main sources of income for five years. The current business earns her about 85,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day.

Phy has just been with VisionFund for one loan cycle and completely paid back the past loan. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice fruitfully and healthily so as to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Theng

texts.en:
Theng is 36 years old and living with her husband and eight children in a rural village of the Bovel district. Rice farming and corn growing are the main sources of her family’s income and she has been doing this for about eight years. The current business earns her family the daily income of about 41,000 KHR (Cambodian riels), but she is able to save 20,000 KHR each day.
 
This is the first loan for Theng with VisionFund. Now, she is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more crops so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Sokun

texts.en:
A widow living in a rural village located in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Sokun is 43 years old and has five children. Sokun has been farming rice and growing various kinds of vegetables for 25 years. The current business earns her about 51,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day. 

Sokun has been with VisionFund for one loan cycle. The past loan has helped her improve her livelihood. She is now applying for a loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more crops so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Yat

texts.en:
Yat, aged 50, is living in a rural village of the Bovel district. She has 12 children, four of whom are dependents and still in school. She and her husband are farmers who have been growing rice and corn in the area to make a living, and sometimes, she works for others for a fee. She has been in this business for 10 years. 

This is a microloan for Yat with VisionFund, and she is a third-loan-cycle client. The past two loans that she completely repaid have helped her relieve her financial burden and improve her livelihood. Now requesting a loan, Yat will buy seeds and fertilizers for supporting her business. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizers for supporting her business

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis, un hombre humilde y muy trabajador, se gana la vida prestando el servicio de jardinería en diferentes fincas del municipio de Santafé de Antioquia.

Vive en una humilde casa junto con su esposa y sus dos hijos a los cuales siempre ha intentado darles lo mejor para que vivan tranquilos.

Es un hombre muy conocido en el municipio gracias a su trabajo y simpatía, cualidades que lo acompañan a todos lados sin olvidar sus 20 años de experiencia en este oficio.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de una máquina para cortar césped, pues en estos momentos realiza este trabajo con unas tijeras grandes porque la maquina que tenia está en muy mal estado y desea remplazarla.

Con esta máquina podrá prestar un mejor servicio a sus clientes y no se desgastara tanto físicamente al realizar este trabajo.

Su mayor sueño es poder conseguir una casa propia en la cual pueda vivir tranquilo al lado de su familia.

Apoye a un hombre emprendedor y humilde con un préstamo!
texts.en: Luis is a humble and hard-working man, who makes his living offering gardening services on different farms in the municipality of Santafé de Antioquia. He lives in a modest house together with his wife and two children who he has always tried to give them the best so that they can live peacefully. He is a well-known man in his municipality thanks to his work and friendliness, qualities that accompany him everywhere, not to mention his 20 years of experience in this work. He is requesting a loan to buy a machine to cut grass as at this time he does this work with a large pair of clippers as his machine is in bad shape and he wants to replace it. He will be able to provide better service to his clients with the machine and not spend so much physical effort doing this work. His main dream is to purchase his own house where he can live quietly along with his family. Support this humble and enterprising man with a loan!

loans.use: to buy a machine to cut grass and improve his gardening services.

loans.name: Leonardo Antonio

texts.es:
Leonardo tiene 38 años de edad, de estado civil soltero, vive con su familia en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.
Es propietario de un salon de belleza. Solicita el crédito para capital de trabajo. Su meta es incrementar su negocio y comprarse un terreno. Su desafío es las enfermedades. En su tiempo libre le gusta leer la biblia.
texts.en: Leonardo is 38 years old, is single and lives with his family in the Cantón Ventanas de los Ríos Province. He is the owner of a beauty salon. He is seeking a loan for working capital. His goal is to grow his business and to purchase a property. His challenge is illnesses. In his free time he like to read at the library.

loans.use: to obtain working capital.

loans.name: Hector Ivan

texts.es:
El señor Héctor es un veterano de mil batallas vividas a lo largo de su vida, vive en el municipio de Liborina con su esposa y sus 3 hijos mayores.

El es un hombre muy trabajador y desde hace algún tiempo viene trabajando en el negocio de la Venta de mercancía variada como ropa y accesorios como linternas, lapiceros y demás objetos, de esta forma alterna los ingresos que percibe con la producción de dos cerdos que tiene para el engorde y el levante.

Su negocio consiste en la compra y venta de este tipo de mercancía a lo largo del municipio. 

El ofrece sus productos de manera ambulante y cuando un cliente le hace un pedido siempre procura por entregarlo rápidamente a pesar de los largos recorridos que debe hacer para llegar a sus clientes.

Manifiesta que es un negocio muy bueno y sencillo de realizar para él.

El solicita un préstamo para compra de surtido de mercancía en ropa nueva y una pequeña línea de juguetería.

El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de capitalizar su negocio y de darle un impulso considerable a su actividad, permitiéndole obtener recursos para la universidad de sus hijos.

Apoya a un padre trabajador y responsable con un préstamo para su negocio!
texts.en: Héctor has been through a lot during in his lifetime. He lives in the town of Liborina with his wife and 3 grown-up children. He is a very hardworking man who has, for some time now, worked in his shop selling a variety of merchandise such as clothing and accessories such as torches, pencils and other things. This allows him to supplement the income he earns from his pigs which he fattens and raises. His business involves buying and selling these types of goods around the town. He sells his goods in the street and when a customer requests something he always tries to deliver it to them quickly, in spite of the long distances he has to cover to reach his customers. He says that it is very good business which is not difficult to run. He is applying for a loan to buy stock - new clothing and a small range of toys. The loan will enable him to capitalise his business and give it a considerable boost so he will then be able to afford to pay for his children to go to university. Please support a hardworking and responsible father by granting him a loan for his business!

loans.use: to buy stock such as clothing and a new range of toys to expand the range of products in his shop.

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.pt:
A senhora Antonieta é professora tem 46 anos de idade é mãe solteira de três filhos dos quais apenas um estuda os restantes dois já são maiores de idade, sustenta também dois netos que vivem com ela.
Com o valor deste empréstimo diz que irá comprar cimento, areia, blocos, para dar continuidade a sua obra.
Fazer muro de vedação do seu quintal e adiquirir uma viatura para transporte sao os seus planos para o futuro.
Diz ainda que para concretiza-los irá solicitar mais empréstimos e que gosta dos serviços oferecidos pela Hluvuku pois tem ajudado muito no desenvolvimento de muitas familas incluindo a sua.
texts.en:
Mrs. Antonieta is a 46 year old teacher and a single mother of three children. Only one of her children goes to school as the other two are already of age and she also supports two grandchildren who live with her.

With this loan she says she will buy cement, sand and bricks to continue the building work on her home.

Building a wall around her house and buying a vehicle for transportation are her plans for the future.
She says that to make them a reality she will request further loans and that she likes the services offered by Hluvuku as they have been very helpful for the development of many families including her own.

loans.use: buy cement, sand and bricks to continue the building work on her house.

loans.name: Matilde Rosibel

texts.es:
Matilde, está satisfecha por los beneficios que ha tenido con la ayuda que le brinda Kiva por medio de Padecomsm  y es por ello que se siente motivada a solicitar más capital para comprar fajas, repuestos, grasa y discos para dar mantenimiento al molino nixtamal. Al realizar esta inversión seguirá mejorando el servicio a sus clientes y generando ingresos económicos para subsistir junto a su familia.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo a mejorar el negocio de venta de granos básicos y especias así como también compro una tolva para el molino nixtamal, logro mejorar sus ingresos, cancelar sus deudas, las circunstancias familiares son mucho más favorables.
texts.en: Matilde is very happy with the Kiva support she has received through Padecomsm and this is why she is keen to seek further capital to buy belts, replacement parts,greasel and discs to maintain her corn mill. This loan will enable her to continue improving the service she offers her customers and generating income to support her family.
