The previous loan helped her to improve her business selling basic grains and spices and to buy a hopper for her corn mill.  She managed to boost her income, pay off her debts and, as a result, her family circumstances are now much better.

loans.use: to buy belts, replacement parts, grease and discs to maintain her corn mill

loans.name: Phalla's Group

texts.en:
Phalla, 46, lives with her husband and four children in a village of Banteay Meanchey province’s Moungkul Borey district. To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice for almost ten years and they supplement the family’s income by working for others for a fee. The current business earns her about 80,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Phalla is just with VisionFund for this cycle and now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. She is going to use her portion of the loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Sreyheap

texts.en:
Sreyheap, 24, is from a rural village located in the Ponhea Krek district of Kampong Cham province. She is married with one daughter. She and her husband earn a living through growing rice and cassava. They have been in this business for four years. To better feed her family, she and her husband also work for others for a fee. The current business earns her family about 40,000 KHR per day.

Sreyheap has been with VisionFund for one cycle and completely paid back the past loan. Now she is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland and will use a portion of it for land plowing. With this loan, she hopes to increase her family’s income so as to better support her family with enough food.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Brenda Elizabeth

texts.es:
Brenda, tiene una venta de ropa nueva y usada, en su puesto de venta también ofrece cosméticos, ella fundo su negocio hace 4 años por motivación propia, el horario en que atiende a sus clientes es de 8:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m., atiende su negocio sola, mantiene su puesto de venta surtido y también distribuye sus productos a otros revendedores; Brenda vive en casa alquilada con tres hijos de 18, 12 y 8 años de edad, ella disfruta mucho ser madre y busca ofrecer a sus hijos un mejor futuro.
Invertirá en la compra de ropa y calzado salvadoreño, le permitirá surtir su negocio con nuevos productos, espera  tener más ventas, aumentar los ingresos y dar a su familia una mejor alimentación, vestuario y educación. 
Su visión es mantener su negocio funcionando, seguir ayudando con los gastos de su hogar, cancelar sus deudas y construir su propia casa.
texts.en:
Brenda sells in new and used clothing from her sales stall and also offers cosmetics. She started her business 4 years ago on her own initiative. Her schedule to attend to her clients is from 8 am until 3 pm, working by herself. She keeps her stall stocked and also distributes her products to other sellers. Brenda lives in a rented house with her three children aged 8, 12 and 18 years old. She enjoys being a mother and wants to provide her children with a better future.

She will invest in the purchase of clothing and Salvadorean footwear which will allow her to stock her store with new products. She hopes to have more sales, increase her income and give her family better food, clothing and education. Her goal is to keep her business functioning and continue to help with the household expenses, pay her debts and construct her own house.

loans.use: to buy clothing and Salvadorean footwear to stock her store with new products.

loans.name: Phally

texts.en:
Phally is age 48 years, married, and has five children. She lives in a rural village of Kampong Cham province’s Dambae district. 

She and her husband earn a living through cassava, cashews and rubber trees, which they have been farming for three years. The current business earns them about US $23 per day. 

Phally has been with VisionFund for one cycle. Phally successfully used the first loan to better support her family. Now she is seeking a new loan to buy seeds, pesticides and fertilizers for her agribusiness. She hopes to grow her business and increase her yield successfully to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds, pesticides and fertilizers for her agribusiness.

loans.name: Alba Nelly

texts.es: Alba es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijas de las cuales una de 12 años asiste a la escuela, una de 14 años asiste al colegio y 2 ya son independientes, Alba es colombiana y ya vive 4 años en Ecuador, comenta que se vino a este país  en busca de trabajo y de una vida mejor para su familia, ella se dedica al jornal de trabajo en el campo y  a la crianza de animales menores, Alba va a invertir el dinero del crédito en la compra de cuyes  para tenerlos en unas cuyeras que le presta la dueña de la casa en la que vive Alba, Alba dice que le gustaría incrementar su negocio para mejorar sus ingresos y que no pierde las esperanzas de algún día comprarse una pequeña casita para mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijas.
texts.en: Alba is the single mother of 4 daughters; one 12 and goes to primary school, one is 14 and goes to secondary school and 2 have now left home. Alba is Colombian and has lived in Ecuador for 4 years.  She says she came to Ecuador to look for work and provide a better life for her family. She works daily in the country breeding small animals. Alba is going to use the loan to buy guinea pigs and keep them in pens lent to her by the owner of the house in which she lives. Alba says that she would like to expand her business so as to boost her income and she never loses hope that, one day, she will be able to buy a little house to improve her daughters' quality of life.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs

loans.name: Nita

texts.en:
Nita is aged 22 years old and married. She lives with her husband and one daughter in a rural area located in Tbaung Khmum district, Cambodia. She is a farmer who has been growing cassava, a business she has been in for three years. The current business earns her family about US$9 per day to feed the family, but she manages to save about US$5 each day.

This is the first loan for Nita with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more yield from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Chanra's Group

texts.en:
Aged 37 years old, Chanra is a married mother of three children living in a rural village of the Sangke district of Battambang province, Cambodia. Rice farming and raising pigs are the main sources of her family’s income and her husband supplements the income by working for others for a fee. She and her husband have been in these businesses for 11 years, earning her about 30,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.
 
Chanra has been with VisionFund for one cycle. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. She is going to use her portion of the loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to grow her rice healthfully and sell it for a good price to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Chanthoern

texts.en:
A rural villager from the Bovel district, Chanthoern is 53 years old and married. She has seven children. She is a rice farmer. She has been in this business for 10 years.  

This is the seventh microloan for Chanthoern with VisionFund. Now she is requesting a new loan to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her family’s income so as to make a living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Ros' Group

texts.en: Originally from Kampong Cham province, Ros is 50 years old and a mother of six children. Her main source of income is from rice cropping on half hectare of farmland and fish-catching business. She has worked at this business for ages and currently it has returned her about 33,300 KHR per day. This is the original loan for Ros with VisionFund(Kiva’s partner). She is part of a group of three to get a new loan. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, rice seed, and insecticide and to pay for labor cost for her farmland. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, rice seed, and insecticide and to pay for labor cost

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Sreang

texts.en:
Living in a rural village of Kampong Cham province’s Kampong Siem district, Sreang is a 60-year-old married mother of three children. 

She and her husband have earned a living through farming rice and growing beans for 35 years. The current business earns her about 48,000 KHR per day and she manages to save about 31,000 KHR each day for future needs. 

Sreang has been with VisionFund for two cycles. The past loans have helped Sreang to better support her family and increase the business. She is now applying for a new loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her current business and also hopes to make more income to improve her family’s living standard.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kampong Siem district

loans.name: Maria Lita

texts.es:
María, ha tenido un impacto positivo  con la inversión del crédito anterior en la agricultura, logro  agilizar la recolección de la cosecha y tener mayores ganancias con la comercialización de cerdos, con ayuda de créditos ha logrado mantener su fuente de ingresos activa y con ella brinda a sus hijos una mejor educación y alimentación.
Está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para tener los recursos económicos con los que comprara abono, semilla, fertilizantes y concentrado para cerdos, son materiales que utilizara para mejorar la productividad del cultivo de granos básicos y la crianza de cerdos, espera tener los buenos resultados del crédito anterior.
texts.en: María invested her previous loan in agricultural activities and it had a positive impact. She managed to streamline the harvest and boost her income from selling pigs.  With the help of loans, she has managed to maintain a steady income which she uses to provide a good education and food for her children. She is seeking a new loan so she will have the financial resources to buy manure, seeds, fertiliser and feed concentrate for pigs, all of which she will use to improve her basic grain crops and pig breeding.  She hopes to have the same good results she had with the previous loan.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, fertiliser and feed concentrate for pigs so that she can improve her productivity

loans.name: Jenny Maribel

texts.es: A sus 32 años de edad Maribel tiene 4 hijos y una hija, mismos que sus edades oscilan entre 8 y 15 años, todos se encuentran asistiendo a un centro educativo, su esposo trabaja al jornal, Maribel se dedica a  la crianza de ganado desde hace 3 años atrás, con el dinero del crédito Maribel  va a comprar terneros para ponerlos en un terreno por el que paga arriendo, lo que ella aspira es mejorar su negocio y con estos ingresos cubrir todos los gastos de alimentación, vestido y educación de sus hijos.
texts.en: At 32 years old Maribel has four sons and a daughter between the ages of 8 and 15 years old. All of them attend a educational center. Her husband works as day labor. For three years Maribel has been raising cattle. With the money from the loan Maribel is going to buy calves to put out to pasture on land she rents. She hopes this will improve her business and that this income will cover all the costs of feeding, clothing and educating her children.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Sokhy's Group

texts.en:
A villager from a rural area located in Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Sokhy is 34 years old and married. She has three children. 

She is a rice farmer. She has been in this business for 20 years, earning about KHR 50,000 per day, and she is able to save about KHR 30,000 each day for future needs. 

Sokhy is just with VisionFund for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to seek a loan. She is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice healthily and fruitfully and also hopes to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Omar Octavio

texts.es: A sus 30 años de edad Omar es un joven muy trabajador, el tiene 2 hijas de 2 y 7 años de edad, la mayor asiste a la escuela, Omar se dedica a la ganadería desde hace 7 años atrás , el trabaja 3 años en una finca donde cuida el ganado, cuenta que en esta misma hacienda le hacen tener dos ternaros por los que no le cobran por la hierba, Omar va a invertir el crédito en la compra de terneros  para aumentar su negocio y  mismo del que espera tener más ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijas.
texts.en: At 30 years old Omar is a hard-working youth. He has two daughters aged 2 and 7 years old, the oldest goes to school. Oscar has been raising cattle for 7 years. He has worked on a farm for three years taking care of the cattle. He says that this same farm allows him to keep two calves there with no charge for the grass. Omar is going to invest the loan in the purchase of calves to expand his business and hopes for more income to improve the quality of living for his daughters.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Set's Group

texts.en:
Set is 43 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She has six children, three of whom are still in school. 

Rice farming and working for others for a fee are the primary sources of her family’s income to make a living, and she has been in this business for 11 years. With the current business, she can earn approximately 36,000 KHR per day and save about 20,000 KHR each day for future needs. 

This is the fourth micro loan for Set with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now leading her group to apply for a loan, Set will use her portion to buy rice seeds and fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business so as to earn a larger income to make a living better and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds and fertilizers for her farmland.

loans.name: Chany's Group

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house with her family members in a rural village of the Dambae district, Chany is 26 years old and married with two children. She and her husband earn a living through planting rice and cassava. Having been in this business for 6 years, she manages to earn about 53,000 KHR per day and can save about 35,000 KHR each day for the future needs. 

This is a group loan for Chany’s group of two females. She is just with VisionFund for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to seek a loan. As the leader, Chany is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland. She hopes to increase her crop yields and earn more income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland

loans.name: Pov

texts.en:
Pov is 47 years old, married, and has five children, living in a rural village of Kampong Cham province’s Kampong Siem district. 

She and her husband earn a living through farming rice, which they have been doing for 27 years. The current business earns them about 36,000 KHR per day and enables them to save about 12,000 KHR each day for future needs.
 
Pov has been with VisionFund for one cycle. Now she is applying for a loan to buy rice seeds for her farmland and use a portion of it to spend for labor. She hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her current business to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kampong Siem district

loans.name: Phorn

texts.en:
Phorn, 42, lives in the rural village of the Kampong Cham province’s Kampong Siem district. She is a married mother of two children. Her family’s income is from farming rice paddies. Her husband also works as a house construction worker to earn more money for the family. She has been in this business for 24 years. From the current business, she can earn about KHR45,000 per day and manage to save about KHR30,000 per day for future needs. 

Phorn has been a member of VisionFund for one cycle already and has completely repaid the loan. With the loan from VisionFund, she successfully used it to better support their living standards. Now applying for another loan, she is going to use it to buy another plot of farmland. With this loan, she hopes to extend her farmland to increase her business to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy another plot of farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kampong Siem district

loans.name: Ny's Group

texts.en:
A villager from the Kampong Cham province’s Koh district, Ny is 32 years old and married. She has two dependent children who are still small. The main source of her family’s income is from growing wax gourd and jicama to make a living. Having been in this business for 12 years, she is able to earn daily income of 34,000 KHR to support her family and she can save about 14,000 KHR per day for the future needs. 

This is the first loan for Ny with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She is leading her group to seek a loan. As the leader, she is going to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to increase her crop yields so as to make a better living and have a bigger house for living in.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Nim Yorn's Group

texts.en:
A 29-year-old married mother residing in a rural village of the Kampong Cham province’s Dambae district, Nem has three children to take care of and earns a living through planting cassava and rice. Having been in this business for nine years, she can earn about 44,000 KHR per day to make a living and can save about 23,000 KHR each day for the future needs. 

Nem’s group consists of two members who live in the same village. Nem is a third cycle client while her group member is a first cycle client with VisionFund. She successfully used the past loans to better her living condition. Now leading her group to apply for a loan, Nem will use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland and use a portion of it to spend for plowing and labor. She hopes to make more cassava so as to increase her family’s income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Jose Neftali

texts.es:
José, vive con su familia compuesta por su esposa y dos hijos de 5 y un año de edad; de su hermano aprendió a comercializar electrodomésticos para el hogar, con la experiencia adquirida emprendió su propio negocio hace ya 14 años, tiene un horario de 6:00 a.m. a 7:00 p.m., aunque suele variar según sea la demanda.
Requiere capital para comprar ollas, frazadas, sartenes, planchas eléctricas, etc.,  de esta manera mantendrá bien surtido el negocio por un tiempo, espera que al comprar al contado los diferentes artículos pueda tener un mayor margen de ganancias, que sus clientes mantengan la fidelidad hacia su negocio, resarcir sus deuda y llevar a su hogar el sustento diario.
Sus proyectos son hacer crecer el negocio para tener mayor rentabilidad que le permita trabajar con capital propio.
texts.en: José lives with his wife and two children, aged 5 and 1. His brother taught him to sell domestic appliances and he used the experience he built up to set up his own business 14 years ago.  he works from 6am to 7pm, although this can vary depending on demand. He needs capital to buy pots, blankets, frying pans, electric irons, etc., to keep his business well stocked for a time.  He hopes that by paying for the different items in cash he can have a better profit margin, keep his customers loyal to his business, pay off his debts and take home enough to cover daily living expenses. His plans are to expand his business so he can boost his income and to be able to work with his own capital.

loans.use: to buy pots, blankets, frying pans, electric irons, etc., this will keep his business well stocked for a time

loans.name: Divine Group

texts.fr: Silvi est commerçante, présidente de la banque communautaire Divine, cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 33 ans, mère de 8 enfants dont 5 scolarisés et 3 gosses. Elle commença son business avec de fonds de reçu  de son mari. Elle est sociétaire d’une boutique avec divers articles manufacturés. Elle va acheter les savons, bougies, sardines, biscuits, stylos, cahiers etc. Son conjoint est un pasteur dans une église.  Elle souhaite obtenir plus des crédits pour accroitre son chiffre d’affaires, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish,  elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Silvi is a businesswoman, president of the community loan group called "Divine", and a client of the microfinance institution Hekima. She is married, aged 33, mother of eight children of whom five are in school and three under school-age. She began her business with money received from her husband. She has a shop offering various manufactured items. 

Silvi is going to buy bars of soap, candles, sardines, cookies, pens, notebooks, etc. Her husband is a pastor of a church. She wishes to have more loans so as to grow her turnover and pay for school fees and food for her children. In conclusion, she thanks Hekima for the support they bring to entrepreneurs who can't obtain bank loans.

loans.use: to buy bars of soap, candles, sardines, cookies, pens, notebooks, etc

loans.name: Ana Raquel

texts.es:
Ana, ha mantenido su tienda funcionando y satisfaciendo a sus clientes, la demanda de sus productos ha aumentado por lo que opta por un nuevo préstamo para comprar huevos, aceite, granos básicos, bebidas, dulces, golosinas, pan, etc., para contar con un negocio más competitivo y seguir teniendo los recursos económicos que tanto necesita para salir adelante.
Con la ayuda del préstamo anterior su negocio se ha mantenido en el mercado como uno de los favoritos por sus clientes para encontrar lo que necesitan, sus ingresos han mejorado un poco y los ha utilizado para cancelar las cuotas de su deuda y cambiar el estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en: Ana has kept her store running and her customers satisfied. The demand for products has increased so she has decide to request a new loan to buy eggs, oil, basic grains, drinks, sweets, bread etc. to have a more competitive business and to have the economic resources she needs to continue progressing. With the help of the last loan she kept her store as one of the favorites in the market for her clients to find what they need. Her income has increased a little and she used this to pay her installments of her loan and change the family's lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy eggs, oil, basic grains, drinks, sweets, bread etc.

loans.name: Yeng's Group

texts.en:
Yeng, 59, is married and has three children residing in a rural village of the Prey Chhor district of Kampong Cham province. To support the family, she has been farming rice for three years while her husband works as a blacksmith to help earn extra income. Together, they can earn about KHR55,000 per day and can save about KHR30,000 each day for the future needs. 
Yeang is new to VisionFund for this cycle and now she is leading her group to seek a loan. She will use her portion to buy a motorbike for use in her family.  She hopes this loan will enable her to reduce some expenses of a motor-taxi.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for use in her family

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Keat's Group

texts.en:
A citizen from a rural village located in the Kampong Cham province’s Ou Reaing Ov district, Keat is 46 years old and married with one kid. For the last 28 years, she has been farming rice to support her family. With the current business, she can earn about 27,000 KHR per day and can save about 15,000 KHR each day for the future needs.

Keat is just with VisionFund for this cycle. She is leading her group to seek a loan and she wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice fruitfully so as to sell if for a good price to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Ky

texts.en:
A citizen from a rural village of Kampong Cham province’s Kampong Cham district, Ky is age 42 years, married, and has two children. 

To make a living and support her family, Ky and her husband have been working as paid workers. The current business earns her about US $23 per day and she can save about US $7 each day after daily expenses.
 
This is the second micro loan for Ky with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is applying for a loan to buy a motorbike for her family to use. She hopes to have a decent motorbike for using.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for her family to use.

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Kampong Cham District

loans.name: Channy's Group

texts.en:
Channy, 47, is married and has three children residing in a rural village located in the Kampong Cham province’s Prey Chhor district, Cambodia. For the last 29 years, she has been farming rice and working as a tailor. The current business earns her about 30,000KHR per day to meet the family’s need. 
Channy is new to VisionFund for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, Channy will use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Thoern's Group

texts.en:
A villager from a rural area located in the Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Thoern is 30 years old and married.  She has three children. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice. Together, they can earn about KHR50,000 per day from the current business and can save about KHR 30,000 each day for the future needs. 
This is the first loan for Thoern with VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more crops so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Touch's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area of the Koh Sotin district of Kampong Cham district, Touch is 36 years old and married. She has five children. To support her family, she has been growing tobacco and sesame. Sometimes her husband catches fish and works for others for a fee. The current business earns her about 54,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs. 

This is the first micro loan for Touch with VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy household supplies for her family. She hopes to have enough supplies for using in her family.

loans.use: to buy household supplies for her family

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Katia

texts.es: Katia es soltera no tiene hijos y vive con sus tios en la comunidad de Pallina Chico en una casa de adobe que le pertenece a su familia (tios) Katia se gana la vida  con la produccion de huevos y la cria de ganado porcino ella trabaja desde muy temprano por la mañana  y necesita un prestamo para la compra de ganado porcino Katia es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Katia is a single, childless woman who lives with her aunt and uncle in their adobe house in the town of Pallina Chico. Katia earns her living by producing eggs and raising pigs.  She begins work very early each morning and needs a loan to buy pigs. Katia provides the family's only income and that is why she needs your help.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Aura Alicia

texts.es: Aura tiene 38 años de edad, ella vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 10, 16 y 20 años de edad, mismos que se encuentran estudiando, Aura se dedica a la crianza de chanchos y también trabaja de  empleada domestica por horas, Aura necesita el dinero para comprar chanchos que los cría en la casa de su suegra donde le presta una chanchera, la aspiración de aura es mejorar su negocio para tener los ingresos que le ayuden a cubrir los gastos de estudio de sus hijos.
texts.en: 38-year-old Aura lives with her husband and 3 children, who are aged 10, 16 and 20 and are all studying. Aura raises pigs and also works some hours as a housekeeper. She needs the money to buy pigs which she raises at her mother-in-law's house, where she uses a pigsty. Aura's ambition is to expand her business so as to have income which will help to cover her children's  study expenses.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Yesu Anaweza Group

texts.fr: Mudumbi est membre du banque villageoise Yesu Anaweza, cliente de l’IMF Hekima, divorcée, âgée de 27 ans, mère de 1 enfant qui va à l’école. Elle a commencé son petit commerce avec de fonds de reçu  après récolte dans son champ. Elle est vendeuse de souliers usagés en ambulatoire, elle va acheter 5 paires de souliers. Elle souhaite obtenir plus des crédits pour accroitre son chiffre d’affaires, acheter une parcelle, construire, scolariser et nourrir son enfant. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables. Il sied de signaler qu'une cliente porte son bébé.
texts.en:
Mudumbi is a member of a loan group known as Yesu Anaweza. She is a client of the microfinance institution Hekima, divorced, aged 27 and the mother of one child who attends school. She began her little business with funds received after harvesting her field. She walks around selling used shoes, and she plans to buy five pairs of shoes. She would like to obtain more loans to grow her turnover, buy a plot of land, build on it, and pay for school fees and food for her child. In conclusion she thanks Hekima for the support it brings to entrepreneurs who are excluded from the banking system. 

Please note that one client is holding her baby in the photo.

loans.use: to buy five pairs of shoes

loans.name: Milagro Del Carmen

texts.es:
Milagro es una señora de 37 años de edad, es ama de casa y estudió hasta quinto grado, por sus pocos recursos económicos no pudo continuar sus estudios; ahora es una mujer acompañada y es madre de 2 hijos de 22 y 13 años de edad los cuales se encuentran estudiando, por lo tanto son los que dependen de ella, su compañero de vida se dedica a la siembra de maíz (agricultura) junto con Milagro la cual también se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, en el apoyo a la siembra de maíz se dedica desde hace dos años decidió ayudarle a su compañero de vida por la situación económica en que vivían, para poder tener un poco mas de ingresos y así tener una mejor calidad de vida ella y su familia, para llegar a su trabajo Milagro y su compañero de vida viajan en una moto taxi dos kilómetros, trabajando en el horario de 7:00 am a 11:30 am todos los días.

El préstamo que esta solicitando en la institución, es para comprar una novilla, con la cual dentro de un tiempo podrá producir más ganancias para ayudar en el bienestar de su familia.

El sueño de Milagro es que sus hijos sean unos profesionales, para tener más oportunidades en un futuro, mejorar su vivienda para darles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y pagar el préstamo adquirido sin ninguna dificultad y así tener oportunidades siempre.
texts.en:
Milagro is a 37-year-old woman.  She is a homemaker and has a fifth grade education because her lack of financial resources prevented her from continuing with her studies.  She is now married and has two children ages 22 and 13, who both attend school and depend on her.  Her husband works planting corn.  Milagro helps him and also dedicates herself to housework.  She has been helping her husband with his corn crops for the past two years because of their financial situation.  This allows them to earn a little more income and provide a better quality of life for their family.  In order to get to work, Milagro and her husband travel on a mototaxi for two kilometers.  They work from 7am to 11:30am everyday.

The loan that they are seeking will be used to purchase a calf that in due time well allow them to generate greater earnings to improve the well-being of their family.  Milagro's dream is for her children to be professionals so that they can have more opportunities in the future, repair their home so that her children have a better quality of life, and pay back the loan without any difficulty, so that they can always have opportunities.

loans.use: purchase a calf that she will alter be able to use to increase her earnings in order to help her family's well-being.

loans.name: Eth's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Kampong Cham province’s Tbaung Khmum district, Eth is 41 years old and married. She has two children. She earns a living through farming rice to feed and support her family members. Having been in this business for 23 years, she is able to earn about KHR29,000 per day and manage to save about KHR10,000 each day for the future needs. 

Eth is in her second cycle with VisionFund, and she completely paid back the past loan. She smartly used the loans to make her living gradually improved. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to grow more rice so as to earn more income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Phoern's Group

texts.en:
Phoern is aged 37 years and married.  She has one child. She lives in a rural village of the Battambang province’s Moung Russey district earning a living through farming rice, while her husband works as a worker to help earn income to support the family. Together, they can earn about KHR50,000 per day from the current business and can save about KHR 30,000 each day for the future needs.
This is the fourth loan for Phoern with VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to seek a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es:
La agricultura es una actividad solamente apta para toda aquella persona que ama la tierra como a una madre, como una engendradora de futuros para la vida.  Buenos futuros de esperanzas para generaciones siguientes. Es el trabajo de don José de 25 años de edad  casado y cuenta con 2 hijas y 2 hijos todos ellos son estudiantes en la escuela de su comunidad.
	
La actividad que don Marcelo realiza es la siembra de: papas, frijol y maíz. Dicha actividad lo realiza en su comunidad donde el vive, sus productos lo comercializa en el mercado local de Sololá el eligió esta actividad porque cuenta con conocimiento de manejo en las hortalizas que lo heredo de su padre. La segunda actividad que el realiza es jornalero en su comunidad.

El uso que don Marcelo le dará al crédito es para la compra de semillas de papa y abonos químicos e orgánicos para que su producción se de papas se buena este año.  Uno de los grandes sueños de el es la construcción de unos cuartos para sus hijos y para que ellos tengan las condiciones de vidas adecuadas y ver que sus hijos se conviertan en profesionales en el futuro.
texts.en:
Farming is something that is only suitable for those who love the earth like a mother, as it is a generator of life for the future. Futures of hope for the coming generations. José is a 25-year-old farmer who is married and has 2 daughters and 2 sons, all of whom study at their local school. 

Marcelo plants potatoes, beans and corn in his community where he lives. He sells his products at the local market in Sololá. He chose to work in this because he learned all about farming from his father. He is also a day laborer in his community.

Marcelo will use the loan to buy potato seeds and chemical and organic fertilizers so that his potato crop will be good this year. One of his biggest dreams is to construct bedrooms for his children and for them to have adequate living conditions. He also would like to see his children become professionals in the future.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and organic fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase corn, firewood, beans and cheese curd.

loans.name: Henry Exau

texts.es:
Henry, ve que con ayuda de créditos puede mejorar su negocio rápidamente por lo que se decidió por un nuevo crédito para comprar papelería, libros, colores, sacapuntas, lapiceros, borradores, entre otros útiles escolares para beneficiar a los estudiantes de la zona, con dicha inversión su negocio seguirá generándole ingresos para continuar prosperando.
Para Henry el financiamiento anterior le permitió comprar los productos necesarios para cubrir las demandas de sus clientes, sus nuevas ganancias le permiten cumplir con sus obligaciones e incluir la venta de nuevos productos para atraer nuevos clientes.
texts.en:
From his previous experience, Henry saw that with the assistance of a loan, he could rapidly improve his business. He has therefore decided to request another loan to buy stationery, books, colors, pencil sharpeners, pens, and erasers, among other school supplies, to benefit local students. With this investment, his business will continue to thrive and generate income. 

Henry’s previous loan enabled him to buy the products needed to meet the demands of his customers. His new revenue allowed him to repay his loan, and to purchase new products to attract new customers.

loans.use: to buy stationery, books, colors, pencil sharpeners, pens, and erasers, among other school supplies, to sell to local students.

loans.name: Les Chérubins Group

texts.fr: Sumbukiya  est femme ambitieuse, membre du collectif de crédits les Chérubins, cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 37 ans, mère de 6 enfants dont 5 vont à l’école et 1 encore gosse. Elle commença son businesse avec de fonds de reçu de son mari. Elle est vendeuse des denrées alimentaires sur la route secondaire de la ville. Elle va s’approvisionner en tomate, huiles etc. Son conjoint est un couturier. Elle souhaite obtenir plus des crédits pour accroitre son activité, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Sumbukiya is an ambitious woman, a member of the loan group called The Cherubim. She is a client of the microfinance institution Hekima, married, aged 37, and the mother of six children of whom five attend school and one is still little. She began her business with funds received from her husband. She sells foodstuffs on a secondary road of the town. She plans to stock up on tomatoes, various sorts of oil, etc. Her husband is a tailor. 

Sumbukiya wishes to obtain more loans to grow her business, and pay for school fees and food for her children. In conclusion, she would like to thank Hekima for the support it offers to entrepreneurs who are excluded from the banking system.

loans.use: to stock up on tomatoes and various sorts of oil, etc

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
María, vive con su compañero de vida, tres hijos de 15, 13 y 3 años de edad; María se dedica a vender sandías, golosinas, jugos, sodas, refrescos y agua, desde hace 12 años, sus labores inician de seis de la mañana y finalizan a las seis de la tarde, ya tiene una cartera de clientes establecida, el negocio lo aprendió de su mamá.
El capital será de ayuda para comprar gatorades, jugos, agua, sodas, golosinas y sandías, de esta manera abastecerá su negocio cada vez que sea necesario por un largo periodo, su objetivo es seguir teniendo a sus clientes satisfechos, tener mayores ventas e ingresos para respaldar el pago de la deuda y cubrir las necesidades de su hogar. Un riesgo en su negocio son los accidentes de tránsito ya que su puesto de venta está ubicado en la carretera.
Su visión es apoyar incondicionalmente a sus hijos para que estudien y reconstruir su vivienda para tener más seguridad en el hogar.
texts.en: María lives with her husband and three children, aged 15, 13 and 3. She has sold water melon, sweets, fruit juices, fizzy drinks, soft drinks and water , for 12 years.  She starts work at 6am and finishes at 6pm and now has a regular clientele, having learning about the business from her mother.  The capital will help her to buy Gatorade, fruit juices, water, fizzy drinks, sweets and water melon so she can stock up her business when necessary over a long period of time.  Her goal is to continue keeping her customers satisfied, to increase her sales and income to enable her to pay off the debt and cover the household expenses. In her line of business, traffic accidents are a risk as her stall is situated on the roadside. Her ambition is to provide her unconditional support for her children so that they can study and she can rebuild her house and have greater security.

loans.use: to buy Gatorade, fruit juice, water, fizzy drinks, sweets and water melon so she can stock up her business when necessary over a long period of time

loans.name: Dinorng's Group

texts.en:
A citizen from a rural village of Kampong Cham province’s Dambae district, Dinorng is aged 25 years and married.  She has two children. To make a living and support her big family, Dinorng and her husband have been farming rice and growing cassava as a primary business for several years. She can earn about KHR52,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s need.
This is the second micro loan for Dinorng with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now leading her group to request a loan, Dinorng will use her portion to buy rice seeds and fertilizers for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to cultivate her rice to earn more income to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds and fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Sokneim's Group

texts.en: Sokneim, a local citizen from Moung Russey district of Battambang province, is aged in early 30s and a mother of four children. She does her rice farming as the main source of income. Now she is in need of working capital to support her business. Therefore, she leads a group of two to get a new loan.  As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed for her crop. She hopes that she can gain a good yield so as she can make more income.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, rice seeds for her crop.

loans.name: Maria Marcela

texts.es:
María de 39 años de edad, es ama de casa, no pudo estudiar por la falta de recursos económicos en que vivían sus padres, esta casada pero por problemas no ha podido concebir hijos, su esposo se dedica a la albañilería mientras que María se dedicaba a los oficos domesticos; pero ahora se dedica a la venta de ropa como faldas, pantalones y camisas trabajo que aprendió por la misma necesidad en que vivía, esta actividad la realiza en el horario de 9:00 am a 3:00 pm. Todos los días.

El préstamo que esta solicitando en la institución, es para la compra de lámina y madera para cambiar el techo de su vivienda ya que esta en malas condiciones.

El sueño de María es ampliar mas su negocio de venta de ropa, ampliar más su vivienda y tener 5 vacas lecheras para poder obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
María is a 39-year-old housewife. She couldn't go to school because her parents didn't have many financial resources. She is married but hasn't been able to have children. Her husband is a construction worker while María takes care of the household chores. Now she has begun to selling clothing such as skirts, pants and shirts, which she learned to do out of necessity. She does this from 9:00am to 3:00 pm every day.

The loan that she's asking for is to buy laminate sheets and wood to replace the roof on her home, as it is in bad condition.

María's dream is to expand her clothing business, make her home bigger, and to have 5 dairy cows to be able to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy laminate sheets and wood to replace the roof on her home as it is in bad condition.

loans.name: Hach's Group

texts.en:
Residing in a rural village of the Koh Sotin district of Kampong Cham province, Hach is aged 27 years and married. She has one child. To support the family, she and her husband have been growing sesame and corn. The current business earns her family about 40,000KHR per day to meet her family’s needs. 
Hach is new to VisionFund for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, Hach wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Mao

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Choeng Prey district of Kampong Cham province, Mao is a 57-year-old married mother of three children. Rice farming has been the main source of her family’s income for 37 years and to better support the family and help to earn more income, her husband works as a paid worker. Together, they can earn about 46,000KHR per day to meet family’s needs and manage to save about 20,000KHR each day for the future needs. 
Mao is new to VisionFund for this cycle and now she is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland and use a portion of it to pay for labor. With this loan, she hopes to grow her rice fruitfully and healthily and also hopes to make more income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Sina's Group

texts.en:
Sina is 51 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the Koh Sotin district of Kampong Cham province. She has five children to take care of.  Rice farming and planting betel nuts and are the primary sources of her family’s income and she has been in this business for 31 years. With the current business, she can earn approximately 48,000KHR per day and save about 18,000KHR each day for future needs. 
This is the third micro loan for Sina with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now leading her group to apply for a loan, Sina will use her portion to buy rice seeds for her farmland and use a portion of it to spend on labor fees. She hopes to increase her current business so as to earn a larger income to make a living better.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Agnes Rachel

texts.fr: Célibataire, âgée de 31 ans, Rachel a un enfant  en charge et habite le quartier d’Adidogomé. Revendeuse de tissus de coupons par vente ambulante dans les institutions privées et étatiques,  elle s’approvisionne  à Hezdranawè deux fois par mois. Rachel  sollicite un prêt pour augmenter son commerce avec 20 unités de tissus afin de  faire plus de bénéfices.
texts.en: A single woman aged 31, Rachel is supporting one child and lives in the district called Adidogomé. She resells lengths of cloth, going on foot through private and public institutions. She buys her wares in Hezdranawè twice a month. Rachel  is asking for a loan to grow her business with 20 lengths of cloth, so as to make more profit.

loans.use: to buy 20 lengths of cloth

loans.name: Ruth Belina

texts.es: Doña Ruth, solicita el crédito para construir parte del muro perimetral de su vivienda, actualmente está hecho de zinc y madera. Comprará materiales de construcción como cemento, arena, hierro, piedrín, tablones, estribos y hacer la construcción de concreto. Esto le dará mayor protección a su familia como también a los inquilinos que tiene, ya que ella alquila cuartos en su vivienda. El crédito anterior fue usado para hacer reparaciones en los servicios higiénicos de los cuartos que alquila, y así poder ofertar un buen servicio a sus clientes. Ella continua vendiendo fritanga, para así generar mayores ingresos para sustentar a su familia.
texts.en: Ruth is applying for the loan to build part of her house's perimeter wall, which is currently made of zinc and wood. She will buy building materials such as cement, sand, iron, gravel, breezeblocks, stirrups and will have the concrete work done. This will provide greater protection for her family, as well as for her tenants, as she lets out some rooms in her house. She used her previous loan to repair the toilet facilities in the rooms she lets out and so could offer good service to her tenants. She still sells traditional Nicaraguan food as a means of generating more income to support her family.

loans.use: to build a perimeter wall for her house

loans.name: Ángela Del Carmen

texts.es:
Ángela es una señora de 62 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudió hasta sexto grado no continuo sus estudios porque decidió casarse y ahora es madre de 9 hijos de 42, 40, 38, 36, 34, 32, 30, 28 y 26 años de edad de los cuales solo dos se encuentran estudiando, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura mientras que Ángela se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar trabajo que lo ha desempeñado toda su vida, ya que su familia ha sido muy numerosa.

El préstamo que esta solicitando en CREDICAMPO, es para pagar los gastos de la tesis de su hija que esta estudiando laboratorio clínico y no tiene recursos económicos para pagar.

El sueño de Ángela es que sus dos hijos sean unos profesionales, ampliar su vivienda y tener 20 animales.
texts.en:
Ángela is a 62-year-old housewife. She studied up to the sixth grade and didn't continue because she decided to get married and she is now the mother of 9 children. Her children are 42, 40, 38, 36, 34, 32, 30, 28 and 26 years old. Only two of them have continued their education. Her husband works as a farmer while Ángela is in charge of the household duties, which she has done her whole life as her family is very large. 

The loan she is requesting from CREDICAMPO would be used to pay for her daughter's thesis expenses, as she is studying clinical laboratory and she doesn't have the financial means to pay.

Ángela's dream is for her two children in school to become professionals, to make household improvements and to have 20 animals.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's thesis expenses, as she is studying clinical laboratory and she doesn't have the financial means to pay.

loans.name: Glenda Esmeralda

texts.es:
Glenda es una jovencita de 27 años de edad, es comerciante y estudió hasta el bachillerato, esta acompañada y es madre de un hijo de 2 años de edad, vive con su mamá, una sobrina y su hermana las cuales dependen de ella, su compañero de vida trabaja como empleado mientras que Glenda se dedica a la venta de antojitos como tostadas de plátano y de yuca, empanadas, nuégados, papitas fritas, yuca frita etc. desde hace 8 años, trabajo que lo aprendió de su madre quien siempre se dedico a la venta de antojitos, para trasladarse a su negocio Glenda camina 200 metros junto con su hermana quien le ayuda en el negocio, trabajando en el horario de 10:00 am a 9:00 pm. Todos los días.

El préstamo que esta solicitando en CREDICAMPO, es para comprar insumos para los antojitos como plátano, yuca, papas, maseca, platos, queso y repollo, para ofrecerles más variedad a los clientes los cuales se sentirán satisfechos y así podrá obtener un mayor ingreso para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.

El sueño de Glenda es que su hijo estudie mucho para que sea un profesional, tener un terrenito propio y poder construir una vivienda digna para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Glenda is a 27 year old business woman with a high school education.  She is married and is the mother of a two year old son.  She lives with her mother, her niece and her sister who all depend on her.  Her husband works as an employee while Glenda works selling snacks such as fried plantains, yucca tostadas, empanadas, nuegados (syrup-coated fried dumplings), french fries, fried yucca, etc.  She has worked in this business for eight years, a trade that she learned from her mother who always worked selling snacks.  In order to get to work, Glenda walks 200 meters with her sister who helps her in the business.  They work from 10am to 9pm everyday.

The loan that she is seeking from Credicampo will be used to purchase supplies to make her snacks such as plantains, yucca, potatoes, corn masa mix, plates, cheese and cabbage to offer more variety to her customers who will feel satisfied and she will be able to generate greater earnings with which to provide her family with a better quality of life.  Glenda's dreams are for her son to study hard to be a professional, to have her own plot of land, and to build a proper home for her and her family.

loans.use: purchase supplies to make snacks like plantains, yucca, potatoes, corn masa mix, plates, cheese and cabbage to offer more variety to her customers.

loans.name: Soeurm's Group

texts.en: Soeurm, 43, is a villager from Battambang province. For her family, rice farming is a single source of income to secure the basic needs in her family. Now she can earn up to 40,000 KHR per day. This is the first loan for her and her co-borrower with VisionFund(Kiva’s partner).  As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed for her farmland. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and rice seed for her farmland.

loans.name: Hoshimjon

texts.ru:
Хошим позитивный и ответственный мужчина в возрасте 61 года. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Он живёт со своей семьёй в небольшом посёлке. Но дом, в котором они живут, маловат и не совсем  благоустроен для хорошего проживания в нём. Жена Хошима домохозяйка, она очень трудолюбивая и заботливая мама.

Сам Хошим заниамется животноводством и земледелием. Этого дохода хватает Хошиму на проживание. Но у него есть мечта, он хочет построить большой дом для своей семьи. Но для этого ему необходимы денежные средства. То, что он зарабатывает не достаточно, чтобы позволить себе построение нового дома. Поэтому Хошим обратился в Арванд и  хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для построения дома. Хошим и его жена  надеются на положительный результат и заранее благодарят Арванд  за поддержку.
texts.en:
Hoshim is a positive and responsible 61-year-old man. He is married and has two children. He lives with his family in a small village, but the house, where they live, is small and not quite set up for a good living. Hoshim's wife is a homemaker and a very hardworking and caring mother.

Hoshim is involved in animal husbandry and farming. This income covers Hoshim's living expenses. He has a dream of building a large house for his family, but needs money to accomplish this. What he earns is not sufficient to allow for a construction of a new house. This is why Hoshim came to Arvand and wants to obtain a loan to buy construction materials to build the house. Hoshim and his wife hope for a positive result and thank Arvand for the support in advance.

loans.use: to buy construction materials in order to build a new house

loans.name: Thon's Group

texts.en: Thon, a local farmer from Moung Russey district of Battambang province, is 27 years old and married.  She is a mother of four children. Two are too young for schooling and two are in school. She strives for a living via rice farming as a single source of income, earning about 40,000 KHR per day. Never having been with VisionFund(Kiva’s partner) before, she leads a group of two to get a new loan.  Thon will spend her entire loan portion to buy rice seed and fertilizer for her crop. She hopes that she gains a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy rice seed and fertilizer for her crop.

loans.name: Chat's Group

texts.en: Chat is 57 years old and a resident from Moung Russey district of Battabambang province. She is a mother of 10 children. To earn a living she grows rice as the main source of income, earning about 30,000 KHR.  This is not the first loan for Chat with VisionFund(Kiva’s partner). She has repaid her past loan completely and it has improved her living gradually. Now, in a group of two, she is a leader. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer for her crop. She hopes that she can gain more yield than before so that she can improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her crop

loans.name: Nanipo

texts.fr: Agée de 32 ans, Nanipo est mariée et mère de deux(2) enfants à Attiégou. Elle est coiffeuse de formation et depuis 2013 elle fait du commerce en vendant des produits de beauté par la vente ambulante dans les quartiers. Elle s’approvisionne une fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé.Nanipo sollicite un prêt pour appuyer son activité afin de satisfaire les besoins des clients et faire plus de profits et prendre soin de ces enfants.
texts.en: Aged 32, Nanipo is married and the mother of two children in Attiégou. She is a trained hairdresser and since 2013, she has been selling cosmetics on foot, by walking through neighborhoods. She buys her wares once a month in the Grand Market of Lomé. Nanipo is requesting a loan to boost her business so as to satisfy the needs of her customers and make more profit and take care of her children.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics

loans.name: Touch's Group

texts.en: A local resident from Battambang province, Touch is 37 years old and has three children. She secures the need in her family via rice farming and her paid-working job. This business earns her about 32,000 KHR per day. This is the third loan for Touch with VisionFund(Kiva’s partner) and she has repaid her past loan completely.  Her living conditions are getting better than before. Now, she leads a group of four to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and to pay for plowing fees. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, insecticide, and to pay for plowing fee

loans.name: Sopheap's Group

texts.en: A resident from Battambang province, Sopheap is 38 years old and married. She has one child who currently is in school. For the sake of her family, rice cropping is the only source of income. It has returned her about 40,000 KHR per day.  Including this loan, Sopheap is in her fourth-cycle and has fully repaid her past loan with VisionFund(Kiva’s partner).  Now she forms a group of three to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed for her crop. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and rice seed for her crop

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
María, vive junto a su familia compuesta por su esposo, 2 hijos, una nuera y un nieto. Ella felizmente desempeña el rol de  esposa, madre, suegra y abuela, se preocupa por el bienestar de su familia es por esa razón que por esfuerzos propios logro establecer una tortillería, su familia le apoya en realizar esta actividad, sus ventajas son que el negocio es muy popular por el buen servicio y que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia.
Necesita el préstamo para comprar maíz y leña al por mayor, de esta manera busca ahorrar en la compra y tener mucho más ganancias, debido a la escases de la materia prima el precio ha aumentado y debe aprovechar y abastecer su negocio en este momento para mantenerse trabajando por una larga temporada, espera cancelar la deuda sin ningún atraso. 
Sus sueños son resarcir su deuda lo más pronto posible, tener recursos económicos para comprar materiales de estudio para su hijo y seguir aportando para los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en:
María lives with her family, which is made up of her husband, their two children, a daughter in law and a grandson.  She happily takes on the role of wife, mother, mother in law and grandmother.  She worries about the well-being of her family, which is why she put so much effort into establishing her tortilla business.  Her family supports her in running this business.  One of her business's assets is that it is very popular due to the great service and the wealth of experience that she has.  

She is in need of this loan to purchase corn and firewood in bulk.  This way, she will save in her purchasing and have much greater earnings.  Due to the rarity of these raw materials, their prices have gone up and she must take advantage and stock her business now so that she can continue working for a long time.  She hopes to pay off the debt without any delays.  Her dreams are to pay back her debt as soon as possible, have the financial resources to purchase school supplies for her son, and be able to continue affording her household expenses.

loans.use: purchase corn and firewood in bulk so that she can save on her purchasing.

loans.name: Khayriniso

texts.ru: Эту женщину на фотографии зовут Хайринисо. Она трудолюбивая сельская женщина в возрасте 43 лет. Хайринисо многодетная мать, у нее 6 детей, которым с 9 до 22 лет. Вся ее семья - она, муж и старшие сыновья занимаются сельским хозяйством. У них есть приусадебный участок земли, на котором они выращивают огородные культуры. Их семья этой деятельностью занимается более 20 лет. Сейчас они проводят сезонный посев и им необходимо купить семена и минеральные удобрения. Для этой цели Хайринисо просит кредит. Она хочет вовремя провести посевы, получить хороший урожай и за счет его прибыли в будущем провести ремонт в доме и женить сыновей.
texts.en: The woman's name on the photograph is Khayriniso. She is a hardworking, 43-year-old rural woman. Khayriniso has many children - she has 6, whose ages range from 9 to 22. All of her family - she, her husband and oldest sons - are involved in agriculture. They have a land plot by their house, where they grow agricultural crops. Their family has been involved in this business for over 20 years. Now they are working on a seasonal sowing and have to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers. This is Khayriniso is requesting this loan. She wants to complete the sowing in a timely manner and get a good harvest, from the profits of which she can make repairs at home and marry off her sons.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Akobir

texts.ru: Акобир молодой активный мужчина в возрасте 31 года. Он живет с женой и четырьмя детьми в районе Яван. Его жена швея. Старший сын и дочь, которым по 8 и 7 лет, ходят в школу, а младшей дочери и сыну по 5 и 3 года. Акобир по природе целеустремленный человек и сейчас перед собой он поставил цель - открыть собственный прибыльный бизнес. Акобир собирается заниматься продажей мужской одежды. Он уже приобрел торговую точку на рынке, и еще одну торговую точку на другом рынке он будет брать в аренду.На первом рынке он будет торговать все 6 дней, а по субботам он будет вывозить свой товар на второй рынок, так как там в этот день бывает большой поток людей. Он уже все спланировал и составил свой мини бизнес план. У него есть начальный капитал, но чтобы привезти товар, его недостаточно. Поэтому он обратился за кредитом. Он надеется, что его поддержат.
texts.en: Akobir is a young and active 31-year-old man. He lives with his wife and four children in the Yavan district. His wife is a seamstress. The oldest son and daughter are 8 and 7 years old, and the youngest daughter and son are 5 and 3 years old. Akobir by nature is a goal-oriented person and now set up a goal for himself to open his own profitable business. Akobir is planning to get involved in selling men's clothing. He already bought a retail outlet at a market and will leases a second one at another market. He will be working 6 days at the first market and bring his merchandise to the second market on Saturdays because there will likely be a lot of people on this day. He has already planned everything and created his own mini-business plan. He has a starting capital to bring in the merchandise, but it is not enough. This is why he requested this loan. He hopes that he will be supported.

loans.use: to buy a selection of men's clothing in order to start his retail business and start earning, and use the profit to hold a wedding for his sister and a circumcision ceremony for his son

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es:
Teresa, es casada, comparte el día a día con su familia la cual está integrada por su esposo y su hijo de 25 años de edad; ella propietaria de un negocio que consiste en la crianza de la ganado y venta de lácteos, desde hace 16 años, lo realiza en un horario de cinco de la mañana a cinco de la tarde, quien le enseño está actividad fue su padre, Ya tiene clientes con los que distribuye sus productos.
Necesita capital parta comprar una vaquilla, aumentara su ganado y a futuro tendrá una mayor producción de lácteos, cuidara bien de ella para cuando sea momento de venderla obtener mayores ingresos.
Teresa anhela tener una ganadería más grande, atraer nuevos clientes, mejorar su situación económica y la calidad de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Teresa is married and lives her day-to-day life with her family which includes her husband and her 25-year-old son. She is the owner of a business that consists of raising livestock and selling dairy products. She has done this since for 16 years and works from five in the morning to five in the evening. Her father taught her the trade. She already has customers that she distributes her products to. 

She needs money to buy a heifer cow to increase her livestock which will allow her to produce more dairy products in the future. She will take good care of it so that when it comes time to sell it, she will be able to sell it for more. 

Teresa longs to have more livestock, to gain new customers, to improve her financial situation and to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a heifer cow to increase her livestock

loans.name: Efrain Galileo

texts.es:
Efraín, tiene trabajos que finalizar y necesita materiales para realizarlo, por lo que se decidió por un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de aislantes, cables, fusibles y pagara a un ayudante para cumplir con el tiempo establecido, espera que los resultados de la inversión sean tan positivos como la del crédito anterior.
Con el préstamo anterior tuvo los materiales necesarios para terminar los contratos que tenía en su momento, las ganancias fueron favorables y cancelo su deuda en menor tiempo. Poco a poco está adquiriendo herramientas desempeñar su trabajo de electricista y reparación de electrodomésticos. Su familia está la fecha se encuentra saludable, se mantienen luchando para salir adelante.
texts.en: Efraín has jobs to finish and needs materials to do so.  He has, therefore, decided to apply for  new loan to invest in the purchase of insulation, cables, fuses and to pay an assistant to help him get the work done on time.  He hopes that he will have the same positive results he had with his previous loan. He used the previous loan to obtain the materials he needed to finish the contracts he had at the time, he made good profits and paid off the debt before the deadline. He is gradually buying the tools he needs to work as an electrician and repair domestic appliances. His family is currently in good health and are continuing to strive to make progress.

loans.use: to buy insulation, cables, fuses and to pay an assistant so as to get the work finished on time.

loans.name: Ngim's Group

texts.en: A resident of Siem Reap province, Ngim is 52 years old and a widowed mother of five children. She manages one hectare of farmland to grow rice as a single source of income. Now she leads a group of two to get a new loan.  Ngim will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and to pay for plowing fees. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and to pay for plowing fees.

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Nit's Group

texts.en:
Nit, aged in early 40s and a mother of two children, is a local farmer who strives for a living via cassava farming and rice cropping. It is a business that she has had for years.  

Nit, is a first time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and forms a group of three to get this loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy cassava seedlings and to pay the plowing fee. She hopes that she can gain a better yield from her cassava farming than before.

loans.use: To buy cassava seedlings and to pay for the plowing fee

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Nary's Group

texts.en: Nary, a villager from Battambang province, is 39 years old and has four children. She grows rice as the main source of income and works for others for a fee. This is not Nary's first loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid her past loan completely and her living condition has improved gradually. Now, in a group of two, she is a leader. She will spend her entire loan portion to renovate her house. She hopes that this loan will help her to fix her house on time so she does not need to worry during this rainy season.

loans.use: to renovate her house.

loans.name: Mong's Group

texts.en:
Originally from Battambang province, Mong is 24 years old and married. She is a mother of one child who is too young for schooling. 

To struggle for a living, Mong grows rice on four hectares of farmland as her main business and works for others for a fee to supplement her income. Now, she is in need of financial aid to support her farming. Therefore, she teams up as a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, Mong will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay for plowing costs. She highly believes that she can gain a good yield with high income so that she can improve her lifestyle gradually.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay for plowing costs

loans.name: Roen

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in the Tbaung Khmum district of Kampong Cham province, Roen is aged 44 years and married. She has five children. To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice for 24 years. The current business earns them about 60,000KHR per day and allows them to save about 33,000KHR each day for future needs. 
This is the first micro loan for Roen with VisionFund and now she is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to grow her business and earn a larger income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Phearum's Group

texts.en: A mother of two dependent children residing in Kampong Cham province, Phearum is 28 years old and is a local farmer who earns a living via cassava and rice cropping. She has been involved in the current business for several years. Now she is in need of working capital for her cash-crops. Therefore, she teams up in a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, insecticides, and to pay for labor costs. She hopes that she can gain more income than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, insecticide, and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es:
Tomas vive con su hijo en la ciudad de La Paz. El oficio que desempeña es el de transportista en el sector público, además de vender cerveza. Tomas necesita el crédito para  añadir otra linea de transporte a sus servicios como transportista (una linea es como una  acción o permiso para prestar sus servicios como chofer (en Bolivia, cualquiera que quiera dedicarse al transporte público debe pertenecer a un sindicato y comprar una acción del mismo para poder trabajar, lo cual esta permitido por el gobierno boliviano) y así poder obtener mayores beneficios y poder cubrir con los gastos que tiene en su hogar.

Tomas es la unica fuente de ingresos en el hogar, por eso necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Tomas lives with his son in the city of La Paz. His service involves public sector transport, in addition to working as a beer vendor. Tomas needs the loan to add another transport line to his services as a transport carrier (a line is like a permit to loan your services as a driver). In Bolivia, anyone who works in public transport should belong to a labor union and buy stock to be able to work, which is permitted by the Bolivian government. With this, he can obtain better benefits and cover the cost of his home expenses. 

Tomas is the only source of income in his household and therefore needs your help.

loans.use: to add another transport line to his services as a transport carrier (a line is like a permit)

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es:
Juan, se dedica a la ganadería y a cultivar granos básicos, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos el primero de 19 años de edad el cual estudia, el segundo de 15 años de edad y su tercer hija tiene 13 años de edad ambos estudian; tiene  su negocio desde hace 15 años, estas actividades las aprendió de su padre, su jornada de trabajo es de ocho de la mañana a cinco de la tarde, ya tiene los clientes a quienes le distribuye el producto.
Utilizará el capital para comprar concentrado para ganado y profilácticos, con lo que sus animales estarán sanos y gordos para venderlos a mejor precio, espera fortalecer su negocio para estabilizar su economía y cumplir debidamente con sus compromisos.
Sus sueños son expandir el negocio y tener la oportunidad de dar a su familia un mejor futuro con una buena alimentación, vestuario, salud y educación.
texts.en:
Juan makes a living farming livestock and basic grains. He lives with his wife and three children; the oldest is 19 years old, the second is 15, and his daughter is 13, and they are all in school. He has had his business for 15 years. He learned the skills from his father. He works from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm, and has customers who he distributes the product to.
 
Juan will use the loan to purchase livestock feed and prophylactics, to make his animals healthy and fat to sell at a better price. He hopes to strengthen his business in order to stabilize his income and make his loan payments.
 
His dreams are to expand the business and have the opportunity to give his family a better future with good food, clothing, health, and education.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed and prophylactics, to make his animals healthy and fat to sell at a better price.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana de 35 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudió hasta el cuarto grado, por la economía en que vivían sus padres no pudo seguir estudiando. Esta acompañada y es madre de tres hijos de 18, 15 y 13 años de edad, de los cuales ni uno estudia y son los que dependen de ella, su compañero de vida se dedica a la agricultura como siembra de Maíz, ajonjolí y maicillo, mientras que Juana se dedica a la venta de mariscos como camarones, pezcado, jaiba, etc., trabajo que desempeña desde hace 12 años y que lo aprendió por la misma necesidad económica en que vivía junto con su familia, Juana trabaja en el horario de 5:00 am a 2:00 pm todos los días.

El préstamo que esta solicitando en CREDICAMPO, es para surtir mas el negocio de mariscos, comprando más camarones, pezcado, jaiba, entre otros y así poder ofrecer mas variedad a los clientes y tener un poco mas de ingresos para el bienestar de ella y su familia.

El sueño de Juana es comprar un terreno, construir una vivienda digna y llegar a tener 5 vacas lecheras para poder mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Juana is a 35 year old housewife with a fourth grade education.  Given her parents' financial situation, she was not able to continue attending school.  She is married and has three children who are ages 18, 15 and 13, of which none attend school but depend on her.  Her husband works in agriculture planting corn, sesame, and sorghum, while Juana works selling seafood such as shrimp, fish, crab, etc.  She has worked doing this for the past 12 years, and she learned the business because of her and her family's financial situation.  Juana works from 5am to 2pm everyday.

The loan that she is seeking from Credicampo will be used to stock her business with seafood by purchasing more shrimp, fish, crab, and other items in order to offer more variety to her customers and have a little more income for her family's well-being.  Juana's dream is to purchase a plot of land, build a dignified home and someday have five dairy cows to improve her earnings with.

loans.use: to stock her business with seafood by purchasing more shrimp, fish, crab, and other items so that she can offer more variety to her customers and have more income for her family's well-being.

loans.name: Jamilet

texts.es: Jamilet es una señora con visión de desarrollo, de profesión maestra de educación secundaria con 15 años de laborar en un instituto de la zona donde vive, es casada con 2 hijos a su cargo, también es propietaria de una mini tienda de Ropa y Cosméticos como otra alternativa económica, esta señora está presentando un problema familiar, por eso visito ceprodel   para solicitar un financiamiento el que utilizaría en gastos personales y de esa manera mejorara sus condiciones y nivel de vida.
texts.en: Jamilet is a lady with plans for growth. She's employed as a middle school teacher with 15 years work experience at an institute in the area where she lives. She's married and takes care of her two children, and also is owner of a small clothing and cosmetics store that functions as another source of income. Currently this lady is experiencing a family problem, and that's why she visited CEPRODEL to request financing to pay for personal expenses and that way improve her living conditions and quality of life.

loans.use: Personal expenses.

loans.name: Alcira

texts.es: Alcira es divorciada, tiene un hijo y vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que le pertenece a su padre Alcira tiene estudios de tecnico en computacion pero el desempleo la ha obligado a cambiar de actividad para poder subsistir, por eso desea un prestamo para abrir un local donde pueda vender chicharrón de cerdo y de de pollo Alcira tiene buena practica en el campo culinario y es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que se recomienda ayudarla
texts.en: Alcira is divorced and has one son. She lives in La Paz in a brick and cement house which belongs to her father. Alcira qualified as a computer technician but, due to unemployment, she has been forced to move into a different business to make a living. As a result, she is applying for a loan to open premises where she can sell pork crackling and fried chicken skin.  Alcira has considerable experience in catering and, as this is the only source of income for household, we ask you to help her.

loans.use: to open premises where she can sell pork crackling and fried chicken skin
