loans.name: Sarom's Group

texts.en: A local farmer from Battambang province, Sarom is a 35-year-old mother blessed with four children. All her children are in school. To cover the needs in her household, she grows rice as their sole source of income. She has teamed up with a group of three to apply for a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire portion of the loan to buy fertilizer and rice seed, and to pay for fees for plowing. She hopes that she can earn more income, in order to keep her kids in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seed and to pay plowing fees.

loans.name: Vattey's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer from Battambang province, Vattey is 36 years old and married. She earns a living via rice farming, fish selling, and through a paid job working at a construction site.  

Due to the lack of financial support for her crop, Vattey leads a group of two to get a new loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). As a leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and insecticide. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and insecticide

loans.name: Somaly's Group

texts.en: Residing in Battambang province, Somaly is 42 years old and married. She is the mother of five children, who are in school and in need of her support. To support this big family, she grows rice, and her husband works as a local doctor. Somaly, a former borrower, has fully repaid her past loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is leading this group of two to apply for a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire portion of the loan to buy fertilizer and rice seed and to pay for labor costs. She hopes that she can gain a better crop yield than she has before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seed and to pay for farm labor.

loans.name: Henry

texts.es:
Henry es un padre de familia ejemplar, tiene 33 años de edad, casado y vive en Ica junto a su familia.
Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Desde muy joven trabaja arduamente para poder brindar un mejor futuro a su familia y sobre todo a sus hijos. Henry trabaja como Jornalero de Campo y le va muy bien porque siempre se esfuerza en todo lo que hace y es muy responsable.
Henry quiere brindar mayor seguridad a su familia, es por ello que está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva por el apoyo que le han brindado, ya que él podrá construir una cerca para su domicilio, de esta manera su vivienda será más segura, podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguirá trabajando con mayor tranquilidad porque sabrá que su familia está segura. Así, dentro de poco tiempo podrá cumplir una gran meta: "Terminar de construir su vivienda".
texts.en: Henry is a model family man. He's 33 years old, married, and lives in Ica with his family. His desire to improve his circumstances is enormous. Since he was very young he has worked diligently to provide his family a better future, especially for his children. Henry works as a field laborer and it's going well for him because he always puts effort into everything that he does and he's very responsible. Henry wants to provide more safety for his family so that's why he's very grateful to Kiva lenders for the support they've given him, since he'll now be able to build a fence for his home. This way his home will be safer and he'll able to improve his family's quality of life, as well as work with more peace of mind knowing that his family is safe. Soon he'll achieve his big goal: "Finish building my home."

loans.use: To build a fence around his home

loans.name: Mao's Group

texts.en: Mao is 46 years old, married, and has four children. She lives in a rural village in the Koh Sotin district of Kampong Cham Province. She and her husband earn a living by planting jicama, as they have done for 26 years. The current business earns them about 35,000 KHR per day. Mao is new to VisionFund. She is leading her group to apply for a loan. As the leader, she wants to use her portion to buy corn seed for her farm and to pay for farm labor. She hopes to grow her corn successfully and increase her current business, so she can better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy corn seed for her farm and to pay for farm labor.

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Saroen's Group

texts.en: Living in a rural village in the Ponhea Krek district of Kampong Cham Province, Saroen is a 42-year-old married mother of six children. She and her husband have earned a living by farming rice for 22 years. To better support the family, she also works for others for pay. The current business earns her about 22,000 KHR per day, and she manages to save about 10,000 KHR each day for their future needs. This is Saroen’s group’s first loan from VisionFund. She is leading her group to apply for a loan. She will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farm. With this loan, she hopes to increase her current business and increase her income, so she can to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Teur

texts.en: Teur is 60 years old, married, and has one son. They live in a rural village in the Tbaung Khmum district of Kampong Cham Province. He and his wife earn their living by farming rice, as they have done for 40 years. The current business earns them about 27,000 KHR per day and permits them to save about 13,000 KHR per day, for their future needs. This is Teur's first loan from VisionFund. He is applying for a loan to buy rice seed for his farm and to pay for farm labor. He hopes to grow his rice successfully and increase his current business, so he can improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy rice seed for his farm and to pay for farm labor.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to fix the walls of the house where she lives as there are leaks in the kitchen, the bathroom and her bedroom which could be dangerous

loans.name: Jose Omar

texts.es:
José, es un joven de 28 años de edad, es soltero y vive en la casa de sus padres; en su familia le enseñaron a administrar una granja de pollos de engorde, su negocio fue fundado hace 5 años, el producto lo comercializa en el mercado municipal de la cuidad en donde vive, no tiene un horario establecido.
José invertirá el préstamo en la compra de pollos y concentrado para los mismos, de esta forma tendrá la granja equipada para mantener la continuidad de su negocio, espera tener pollos saludables y de diferentes edades para  cumplir con los pedidos semanales.
Sus proyectos son continuar creciendo con el negocio, mejorar las ganancias para cancelar su deuda y ayudar a sus padres para tener un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en: 28-year-old José is single and lives in his parents' home. His family taught him how to run a farm with chickens for fattening.  He set up his business 5 years ago and sells his products in the market in the town where he lives.  He does not work to any particular timetable. José will use the loan to buy chickens and concentrate for them so that he can have a fully stocked farm and keep his business afloat. He hopes to have healthy chickens of different ages so he can meet his weekly orders. His plans are to continue expanding his business, improve his earnings so as to pay off the debt and provide a better lifestyle for his parents.

loans.use: to buy chickens and concentrate for them so that he can have a fully stocked farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase scissors, fabric, zippers, buttons, shoulder pads, and other important materials to make clothing.

loans.name: Kimpov's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer from Kampong Cham province, Kimpov is 39 years old and married. She is a mother of seven children and deals with the family’s hardship via growing rice on one hectare of farmland. To supplement the family income, she does paid-working jobs at a construction site. She can earn about 36,000 KHR per day. 

This is the first loan for Kimpov with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Now, in a group of five, she is the leader.  Kimpov will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, rice seed, and to pay the plowing fee. She hopes to gain a higher yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, rice seed, and to pay plowing fee

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kang Meas District

loans.name: Ren's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer from Battambang province, Ren is 47 years old and married. She is a mother of four children, three of whom still count on her currently as one is too young for schooling and two are in school. 

Ren earns a living via fish catching for resale and through a paid working job. This is not the first loan for Ren with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid her past loan wisely and it has uplifted her lifestyle gradually. 

Now, Ren forms a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy raw materials to make a fish trap. She hopes that she can catch more fish so that she can keep improving her lifestyle gradually.

loans.use: To buy raw materials to make a fish trap

loans.name: Cham's Group

texts.en:
Cham is 38 years old and married with four children, two of whom are dependents. She lives in a rural village of the Moung Russey district where crop farming a common way to make a living. Like other villagers, rice farming has been her family’s main source of income for 25 years. 

Cham’s group consists of two members who are both female. Cham has been a member of VisionFund for four cycles already and completely paid back the loans while her group member has been with VisionFund for one cycle. The past loans have helped Cham's family with sufficient food and better support for the business. Now she is leading her group to apply for a loan. She wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice fruitfully and healthily so as to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Khorn's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer from Kampong Cham province, Khorn is 34 years old and a mother of three schoolchildren. For the sake of her kids, she grows cassava and run a small grocery stall as their main source of income. This business has generated her almost 39,000 KHR per day. 

This is not the first loan for Khorn with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has fully repaid her past loan and used it wisely and now she is leading a group of two to get a new loan. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy more grocery items for resale and to buy fertilizer for her cassava. She hopes that she can support both business in a  timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy more grocery items for resale and to buy fertilizer for her cassava

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es: Felipa es casada, tiene 43 años y tres hijos Ella vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es de su propiedad pero la vivienda no esta terminada y tiene lugares donde hay inestabilidad debido a los fierros que no han sido terminados en la construccion Felipa es administradora y agente inmobiliario Necesita un prestamo para refaccionar las paredes de su domicilio y terminar lo que falta en la construcción El esposo de Felipa es un chofer viajante pero lo que gana no alcanza para terminar la construccion de la casa por eso necesita su ayuda En la foto aparece Felipa con su marido
texts.en:
Felipa is married, she is 43 years old and she has three children. She lives in La Paz in a house made of brick and cement, which is on her property. The home is not finished and there are unstable areas due to unfinished rebar.

Felipa is an administrator and real estate agent. She needs a loan to repair the walls in her home and to finish the remaining construction.

Felipa's husband is a chauffeur, but his salary is not enough to finish the construction of the house, which is why she needs help. The photo shows Felipa with her husband.

loans.use: to repair the walls of her home and to finish the remaining construction.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase organic supplies to fertilize cacao.

loans.name: Samneang's Group

texts.en:
Battambang province is the home of Samneang and her family, which consists of three dependent kids; two children are too young for schooling and one is in school. She overcomes her family’s hardships via rice farming and through her paid working job. This business, as well as her occupation, earns her about 40,000 KHR per day. 

Samneang is now in need of working capital to support her cash crop, so she leads a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer for her crop. She hopes that she can boost her crop yield so that she can make more money to renovate her house to a better condition.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her crop

loans.name: Keang's Group

texts.en:
A mother of two dependent kids, Keang is 36 years old and a villager from Kampong Cham province who strives for a living via cassava farming on one hectare of farmland. The business that she has had for four years has returned her about 30,000 KHR per day.  

Keang, a prior borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), has fully repaid her past loan and has formed a group of two to get a new loan. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, rice seed, and to pay for weeding costs. She hopes to gain a better yield than before so that she can make more and manage to lease an additional plot of farmland to grow more cassava.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, rice seed, and to pay for weeding costs

loans.name: Lin's Group

texts.en:
A villager from Kampong Cham province’s Ponhea Krek district, Lin is 22 years old and married. She is a mother of one child who is too young for schooling. Her daily cost of living depends on her rice and cassava farming. 

Lin is new to VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is leading a group of two to get a new loan. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy potash for her cassava. She hopes to gain a double yield so she can make more income to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy potash for her cassava

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Saren's Group

texts.en: Saren is 38 years old and a mother blessed with two children. She and her entire family reside in Kampong Cham province’s Tbaung Khmum district where her rice is grown. This business has returned her almost 28,000 KHR per day.  This is a new loan for Saren. She has formed a group of two to get a new loan. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and to pay for labor costs. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and to pay for labor costs

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Los Vendedores De Chujulimul Group

texts.es:
Las calles de Sololá es testigo de los colores más vistosos impregnados en las blusas y fajas típicas.  Es imposible que cualquier turista deje de admirar este producto, pararse y hacer una buena compra de ello. Es el trabajo que realiza don Tomás casado con una familia hermosa de 2 hijos, una niña de 8 años de edad y un hijo de 6 años, ellos son estudiantes de la escuela que les queda cerca de la comunidad donde viven, (Tomas es la que porta una chumpa de color negro es la que se encuentra de segunda de izquierda a derecha)

La actividad que el realiza es la confección de ropa casual y ropa típica actualmente el lleva 6 años realizando dicha actividad con tanto empeño y dedicación para tener un ingreso económico para su familia, su esposa a sido de gran ayuda a Tomás  porque ella es tejedora de ropa típica ella la ha venido realizando desde hace un buen tiempo atrás y les a ayudado en sus ingresos.

El se a convertido en un ejemplo en su comunidad y es por ello que un grupo de hombres y mujeres se a juntado con el para emprender juntos el negocio ya que genera buena ganancia. 

El uso respectivo que le dará al préstamo gestionado por Tomás es para la compra de de mercadería ya que por medio de eso el puede realizar su trabajo y generar más ganancias, uno de las aspiraciones de el es dar estudios a sus hijos y ver que se conviertan en profesionales en el mañana y construir casas para sus hijos para que tengan las condiciones de vidas adecuadas.
texts.en: The streets of Sololá illustrate the most eye-catching colours of the typical blouses and belts. No tourist can fail to stop and admire them and even buy one. This is the work of Tomás, who is married with a beautiful family consisting of 2 children - a daughter of 8 and a son of 6, who go to the nearby school in the town where they live.  (Tomás is the person wearing a black jacket. He is the second from the left). He has been making casual and traditional clothing for 6 years and he works with great determination and dedication to provide an income for his family. His wife has been a great help to him because she weaves traditional clothing, something she has been doing for some time and this has helped to boost their income. Tomás has become a role model in his town and that is why a group of men and women have joined him to run the business together as it is a good source of income. The loan will be managed by Tomás and will be used to buy merchandise as this will enable him to do his work and boost his earnings. One of his ambitions is to pay for his children's education and see them have professional careers and to build houses for his children so they have adequate living conditions.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Sia's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a village of Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Sia is aged 56 years and married with ten children. For more than 30 years, he and his wife have been sewing old shoes to resell in the village.

Sia has been a member of VisionFund for five cycles already and he wisely and successfully used the past loans to make his living conditions better. Now he is leading his group to seek for a loan to buy more old shoes to sew. He hopes to make more money in order to support his family.

loans.use: to buy more old shoes to sew and resell

loans.name: Chanthol's Group

texts.en: Chanthol, a resident from Kampong Cham province, is 51 years old and married. She supports her household via rice farming and maize farming. This is the first loan for Chanthol with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Now, she is leading a group of eight to get a new loan. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy rice seed and to pay plowing fees for her cash-crop. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To buy rice seed and to pay for plowing fees

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kang Meas District

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to pay for the maintenance of her banana crops.

loans.name: Hilda Mabel

texts.es:
Hilda, se decidió por un nuevo crédito para reinvertir en su negocio y mejorar sus ventas, comprara abono para la milpa de postrera, de esta manera le dará un mejor desarrollo a su cultivo, espera tener una cosecha abundante para alimentar a su familia y continuar elaborando la venta de tortillas.
El capital anterior le ayudo a mejorar la venta de tortillas, la popularidad del negocio es mayor, ha mejorado sus ventas, ya inicio a elaborar prendas de vestir, manifiesta que se ahorra un poco en el vestuario personal y familiar, ya que ella elabora sus propias vestimentas.
texts.en:
Hilda decided to apply for a new loan to invest in her business and improve sales. She will buy fertilizer for the final corn harvest to help develop her crops. She hopes to have a bountiful harvest to feed her family and continue developing the sale of tortillas. 

The previous loan helped improve the sale of tortillas; the popularity of her business has grown and sales have improved. She states she has saved a bit on clothing for herself and her family, as she now prepares her own wardrobe.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the final corn harvest.

loans.name: Nilma Liseth

texts.es:
Nilma, se ha decido por un nuevo préstamo con el que comprara cemento, hierro, arena y ladrillo, con estos materiales reparará el corral de cerdos, para fortalecer la crianza de cerdos.
Nilma mejoro la ganadería, ha estabilizado su situación económica gracias al apoyo que recibe por medio de préstamos, las nuevas ganancias son invertidas en cubrir los gastos de su hogar, cancelar sus deudas y además compro cerditos para iniciar un nuevo rubro.
texts.en:
Nilma has decided to get a new loan with which she will buy cement, iron, sand and brick. These materials will repair the pig pen, to boost pig raising. 

Nilma improved the livestock, and her financial situation is stable thanks to the support she has received in the form of loans. The new profit is spent on covering household expenses, paying her debts as well as buying piglets to start a new line of work.

loans.use: to buy cement, iron, sand and brick, which will repair the pig pen.

loans.name: Señor Del Calvar Group

texts.es: El grupo “SEÑOR DEL CALVARIO DE HUARIQUIÑA”  está conformada por socios dedicados a la agricultura y comercio minorista. Jannina  tiene 34 años de edad es conviviente con 02 hijos independientes. Ella cuenta con una bodega que implemento en su vivienda. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de una vitrina exhibidora para mostrar sus productos. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Jannina  es la se encuentra sentada en el  lado izquierdo.
texts.en:
"Señor del Calvario de Huariquiña" is comprised of members who are dedicated to agriculture and retail. 

Jannina is 34 years old and she lives with her partner and has two independent children. She has a grocery store set up in her home. 

The loan will be spent on buying a display case to show her products. The group is thankful for Kiva investors because of the loan they have been given. 

Jannina is the one sitting on the left side.

loans.use: to buy a display case.

loans.name: Victoriano

texts.es:
Victoriano, es agricultor, vive con su esposa con la cual tiene dos hijos; Victoriano cultiva granos básicos, está actividad por excelencia es su medio de sustento para toda la familia, lo aprendió desde muy joven y sea mantenido practicándolo y lo hace junto a su hijo mayor.
Con el crédito comprara insumos agrícolas para la siembra de postrera, como herbicidas, abono, plaguicidas y semilla, con esta inversión tendrá los materiales para darle un mejor trato a sus cultivos y de esta manera aumentar la productividad de la cosecha.
Su visión es poco a poco ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida familiar, obtener mejores cosechas cada año y resarcir su deuda.
texts.en:
Victoriano is a farmer. He lives with his wife, with whom he has two children. Victoriano grows basic grains which he does well and is the source of income for his whole family. He learned the trade when he was very young and he is still doing it. His oldest son works with him. 

With the loan, he will buy agricultural supplies for their last sowing such as herbicides, fertilizers, pesticides and seed. With this investment he'll have the materiales needed to improve his crops and to increase his harvest.

His vision is to go little by little improving his family's quality of life, to yield a better harvest each year and to repay his debt.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for his last sowing

loans.name: Mercedes De Jesus

texts.es: Mercedes, mantiene funcionando su negocio de crianza de cerdos y gallinas gracias a la inversión del capital anterior, mantiene satisfechos a sus clientes, sus ventas e ingresos han incrementado, su familia está recibiendo un mejor alimento diariamente. En esta oportunidad  se decidió por un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo para comprar de cerdos y gallinas para seguir mejorando su negocio, espera tener tan buenos resultados como en el crédito anterior.
texts.en:
Mercedes keeps her business of raising pigs and chicken functioning thanks to her previous loan. She keeps her customers satisfied, her sales and earnings have increased, and her family is consuming better food daily.

On this opportunity, she decided to ask for another loan to invest it in buying pigs and chickens to continue improving her business. She hopes to have as great results as she did with the previous loan.

loans.use: to buy pigs and chickens to continue improving her business.

loans.name: Ricardo Antonio

texts.es:
Don Ricardo, entre números y calculadoras ha logrado salir adelante, ya se encuentra en su segundo año de la carrera de contaduría pública y tiene muchos deseos de superación. Está casado y tiene cuatro hijos a su cargo, se siente muy orgulloso ya que ellos también están estudiando y quiere que salga adelante así como él lo ha hecho. Se siente satisfecho con lo que está estudiando porque le va a permitir desempeñarse mejor en el puesto donde está ejerciendo actualmente.
Solicita el crédito para pagar las mensualidades de su carrera y lograr así terminarla satisfactoriamente. El crédito le ayudara a coronar su carrera y así obtener mayores ingresos para su familia. Su meta próxima es terminar la carrera y seguir estudiando. Dentro de sus planes futuros están estudiar un posgrado y luego una maestría.
texts.en:
Ricardo, with numbers and calculators, has succeeded in getting ahead. He is already in his second year of his public accounting degree and is eager to excel. He is married and has four children. He feels very proud that they are also going to school and he wants them to get ahead like he's done. He likes what he's studying because it will allow him to perform better at the job he is currently working. 

He is asking for the loan to make his monthly payments for his degree and to succeed in completing it successfully. The loan will help him finish his degree and to therefore receive a better income for his family. His next goal is to finish his degree and keep studying. His future plans include going to graduate school and to get a master's degree.

loans.use: to pay the monthly payments for his degree.

loans.name: Basbigul

texts.ru: Басбигул, так зовут эту 37-летнюю жительницу района Яван. Она замужем и является матерью 5 детей. Все ее дети еще учатся в школе, а после занятий они помогают родителям в их работе по сельскому хозяйству. Басбигул имеет небольшой участок орошаемой земли, на котором она, ее муж и дети выращивают овощи и зерновые культуры. Так как сейчас начался очередной сезон посева, их семья готовится к работам на земле. Чтобы приобрести семена для посева и минеральные удобрения, Басбигул запрашивает кредит. Она планирует получить богатый урожай и за счет прибыли от их продаж женить своего старшего сына. Ваша финансовая поддержка ей необходима сейчас.
texts.en: Basbigul is a resident of the Yavan district. She is married and has five children. All of her children are in school and help on the farm after lessons. Basbigul has a small plot of irrigated land where her family grows vegetables and grains. Since the planting season has begun, the family is ready to work on the land. Basbigul is requesting a loan in order to purchase seeds and fertilizers. She is planning for a good harvest and will use the profits to pay for her eldest son's wedding. She needs your financial support.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs and firewood.

loans.name: David Omar

texts.es:
David, mejoro su negocio gracias a la compra de una consola de videojuegos  nueva que pago de contado con la ayuda del préstamo anterior,  su circunstancias familiares son mejores  que antes, mantuvo la puntualidad en sus pagos y les está enseñando a sus hijos a reparar consolas de videojuegos, para que en un futuro ellos establezcan su propio negocio.
David, requiere más capital para comprar los videojuegos más novedosos del mercado con los que su negocio supere a la competencia, espera tener el impacto positivo del crédito anterior y tener puntualidad en el pago  de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
David improved his business thanks to his previous loan by purchasing a new video game console in cash. His family's situation is now better than before. He made his loan payments on time and is teaching his children how to repair video game consoles so that in the future they can start their own business.

David needs more capital in order to buy the latest video games on the market. The new games will allow him to surpass the competition. He hopes to repeat the positive effects of his previous loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy the latest video games.

loans.name: Ratana's Group

texts.en:
Ratana lives in a rural village in the Mongkul Borey district of Banteay Meanchey province, Cambodia. She is 44 years old and married, with three children. To support the family, she has been working as a paid worker for several years. The current work earns her about 39,000 KHR per day.  

Ratana has been with VisionFund for six cycles. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to renovate her old house. She hopes to have a decent house for living in.

loans.use: to renovate her old house

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Chhet's Group

texts.en:
Residing in a rural village in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Chhet is 48 years old and married. She has eleven children, two of whom are still in school while the others have their own employment. To support the big family, she and her husband have been farming rice for 20 years. The current business earns her family about 60,000 KHR per day to meet her family’s needs. 

Chhet has been a member of Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for five cycles already and she successfully used her past loan to better support her family in having sufficient food and to support her children’s education. She is applying for another loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to grow more crops so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Che's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Che is a 52-year-old married mother of six children. Rice farming has been the main source of her family’s income for 25 years, to support the family and help to earn income. Together, they can earn about 60,000 KHR per day to meet family’s needs and manage to save about 40,000 KHR each day for future needs. 

Che is just with VisionFund for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to seek a loan. Che wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to grow her rice fruitfully and healthily and also hopes to make more income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Rita Cecilia

texts.es:
Rita es una joven madre de familia, soltera, de 30 años de edad y vive en Calleria junto a su familia.
Tiene un hijo por quien lucha día a día para poder brindarle un futuro mejor y todas las comodidades que se merece. Desde hace más de 1 año trabaja como Comerciante, se dedica a la venta de comida y bebidas y le va muy bien porque siempre se esfuerza en todo lo que hace y ofrece productos de calidad a los clientes.
Rita está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá comprar muebles para amoblar su domicilio y así pueda mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. De esta manera seguirá esforzándose para poder sacar a su hijo adelante y más adelante poder cumplir una gran meta: "Ampliar su negocio de venta de comida".
texts.en:
Rita is a young single mother. She is thirty years old and lives in Calleria with her family. She has a son for whom she strives day after day in order to be able to give him a better future and all the comforts he deserves. She has been working as a vendor for over a year, selling food and drinks. Things are going very well for her because she always gives her all to anything she does and provides quality products to her customers.

Rita is very grateful to Kiva lenders because their support will allow her to buy furniture to furnish her home in order to improve her family's quality of life. She plans to keep doing her very best to provide for her son and later on meet her goal of expanding her food-sales business.

loans.use: to buy furniture for her home.

loans.name: Kun

texts.en:
Kun is 44 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area in the Kampong Siem district of Kampong Cham province. She has nine children to take care of. Rice farming and bean growing are the only primary sources of her family’s income and she has been in this business for 24 years. With the current business, she can earn approximately 72,000 KHR per day and save about 40,000 KHR each day for future needs. 

This is the second microloan for Kun with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is applying for a new loan to buy rice seeds for her farm. She hopes to increase her current business so as to earn a larger income to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds for her farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kampong Siem district

loans.name: Meng

texts.en:
Meng, 35, lives in a rural village in Kampong Cham province’s Memot district, in Cambodia. He is married and has one child. For the last seven years, Meng has been farming rice and growing cassava nuts. The current business earns him about 20 USD per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Meng is just with VisionFund for this cycle. Now he is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for his farmland. He hopes to make more income from his current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for his farmland

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Shahnoza

texts.ru: Шахноза молодая и жизнерадостная женщина. Она заботливая мать 2 маленьких детей. Ее муж строитель. Шахноза вместе с ее семьей живет в отдаленном регионе на Севере Таджикистана. Она занимается скотоводством уже более 7 лет. Шахноза начала свой бизнес с собственным капиталом. Постепенно она развевала свой бизнес. Данное время она знает все тонкости этого бизнеса. Шахноза откармливает 3 голов крупно-рогатый скот и 19 голов мелкий-рогатый скот. Шахнозе помогает ее муж введению бизнеса. Они трудятся с раннего утра, упорно, чтобы зарабатывать на жизнь. Шахноза запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки скота, чтобы увеличить оборотный капитал. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Shahnoza is a young and cheerful woman, and the thoughtful mother of 2 small children.  Her husband is a builder.  Shahnoza lives with her family in a remote area of northern Tajikistan, and has worked in animal husbandry for more than 7 years.  Shahnoza supplied her own capital to start her business and has gradually expanded that business.  She now knows all of the intricacies of her business.  Shahnoza is raising 3 head of cattle and 19 head of sheep.  Shahnoza's husband helps her run the business, and they work from the break of dawn in order to make a living.  Shahnoza is asking for a loan of 10,000 TJS to purchase cattle in order to increase her working capital.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle to increase her working capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn and  firewood in order to sell tortillas and paper products, erasers, pencil sharpeners, etc. for her mini-bookstore.

loans.name: Yuth's Group

texts.en:
Aged 35 years, Yuth is married and lives with her family in a rural area located in the Dambae district of Kampong Cham province. She is the mother of two children. She earns a living through farming rice and growing cassava, which she has been doing for 17 years. Together, she and her husband can earn about KHR 54,000 per day from the current business and are able to save about KHR 27,000 each day for the future.

This is the fourth loan for Yuth with VisionFund. She has used the past loans wisely and successfully to improve her family’s livelihood. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. This loan will enable her to extend her farmland so as to increase her rice farming production to better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tomography, an electrocardiogram, beta blocker pills, a cardiologist consult, and pills for tachycardia.

loans.name: Grupo Pajomel Group

texts.es:
La tierra ha sido bendecida por manos que les gusta trabajar y cuidarla.  Es un oficio digno de admirar el que hombres se dediquen por años y para toda la vida.  La tierra sin la labor de hombres campesinos dedicados al cultivo de la misma, no daría los frutos que sostienen generalmente a toda generación, es el trabajo que realiza Andrés de 50 años de edad y tiene 6 hijos tres son mujeres y tres son varones, dos de ellos ya tienen familias apartes y los cuatros son excelentes estudiantes de la escuela de la comunidad, (Andrés es la que se encuentra de primero de izquierda a derecha y tiene puesta una camisa color blanco)

La actividad que le realiza es la siembra de de café, frijol y maíz, el eligió esta actividad porque cuenta con terreno y clima apta para la siembra de café y le genera muy buenos ingresos económicos para el, la segunda actividad que el realiza es jornalero en su comunidad siempre con la visión de ayudar a sus vecinos en su comunidad.

El se a convertido en un gran ejemplo en su comunidad y es por ello que un grupo de personas emprendedores se han unido a Andrés para emprender juntos con el para tener éxitos en un futuro y tener ingresos económicos para sus familias.

El uso respectivo que el le dará al crédito que el realiza es para la compra de fertilizantes para el cultivo de café. Una de las metas de don Andrés es incrementar su producto de café y mejorar  sus prácticas de manejo en el cultivo de café.
texts.en:
The land is blessed when it finds hands that like to work and take care of it. This line of work is admirable, and the men that carry it out dedicate many years and entire lives to it. When the land has farmers to take care of it, it bears fruit to support an entire generation. That is the work Andrés does. He is fifty years old and has six children, three daughters and three sons. Two of them have started their own separate families and the other four are excellent students attending the local school. Andrés is the first person from the left, wearing a white shirt.

His business is growing coffee, beans, and corn. He chose this work because he has a plot of land, the weather is suitable for growing coffee, and he makes a very good income this way. His second business is working as a laborer within his community, always with the vision of helping out his neighbors.

He has become a great example for his community, which is why a group of enterprising people have joined Andrés in order to partner with him and achieve future success and make an income for their families.

Andrés will use his share of this loan to buy fertilizer for his coffee plantation. One of his goals is to increase his coffee production and improve his business practices.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Najmi

texts.ru: Начми добрая женщина. Она пережила много трудностей в своей жизни. Ее муж умер, и она осталась без кормильца с 3 детьми. Ее старший сын Фаррух помогает ей по домохозяйству. Она один месяц назад начала свой собственный бизнес: переработкой семечек. Она покупает семечки оптом, перерабатывает, упаковывает и продает на местном рынке. С целью расширения нового бизнеса она хочет купить оборудование для переработки семечек.  Начми запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 долларов США для покупки оборудования. Она уверена, что после покупки оборудования, ее новый бизнес будет процветать, и она будет обеспечить новыми рабочими местами своих соотечественников. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Najmi is a kind woman.  She has overcome many difficulties in her life - her husband passed away, and she was left with 3 children and no breadwinner.  Her eldest son, Farrukh, helps her around the house.  One month ago she started her own business selling seeds.  She buys the seeds in bulk, processes them, packages them, and then sells them at the local market.  With the goal of expanding her new business, she wants to purchase equipment for processing seeds.  Najmi is asking for a loan of 2000 US dollars to purchase the equipment.  She is confident that, after the purchase of this equipment, her new business will flourish, and will provide new jobs for fellow countrymen.  She awaits your goodness.

loans.use: To buy equipment for processing seeds

loans.name: Phalla's Group

texts.en: Phalla is a citizen from Moung Russey district of Battambang province, where rice cropping is the most popular cash crop in the area. She is the mother of three kids, one schoolchild and two under-school aged kids. This business earns her about 27,000 KHR per day.  Phalla is a first time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She leads a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, rice seed, and to pay the plowing fee. She hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, rice seed, and to pay the plowing fee

loans.name: Marta

texts.pt:
A Sra. Marta de 26 anos de idade, casada e mae de 4  filhos dos quais 2 estão a frequentar  a escola no ensino primario e 2 sem idade para frequentar a escola. Ele è operaria agricola na empresa de produção de banana a mais de 2 anos 
Com o presente emprestimo sera aplicado para comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, porta e pagamento de mao de obra.) para dar continuidade com a construcao da sua casa.
texts.en:
Mrs. Marta is 26 years old, married and the mother of 4 children, of whom 2 go to primary school and 2 are not of school-going age. She has been a farmer at the banana production company for more than 2 years.

This loan will be used to buy construction materials (sheets of zinc and a door) and to pay for labour to continue the construction of her house.

loans.use: buy construction materials (sheets of zinc and a door) and to pay for labour to continue the construction of her house

loans.name: Geisel

texts.es: Geisel es una mujer con 37 años de edad, madre de un niño y es jefa de hogar. Vive con su hijo, el cual cursa la primaria y dos hermanas que ella mantiene desde el momento en que su madre falleció. Es una mujer muy trabajadora, esforzada y con muchos deseos de salir adelante. Tiene visión empresarial, a pesar que su negocio ha presentado altibajos a traves de los años le ha ido bien, debido a que ha podido enfrentar las obligaciones adquiridas. Su negocio es un bazar, cuenta con una cartera sana de clientes, gracias al buen trato y forma de pago que le brinda a sus clientes, los cuales son familiares, vecinos, escolares y trabajadores de diferentes comercios e instituciones de la comunidad limonense. Ha obtenido varios créditos con la Fundación y siempre ha mostrado puntualidad y responsabilidad. Ahora solicita otro financiamiento para reforzar su negocio comprando ropa de mujer y hombre para su bazar, asi satisfacer a sus clientes y generar mayores ingresos, para mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Geisel is a 37-year-old woman, the mother of one child, and the head of the household. She lives with her son, who is in primary school, and two sisters of hers who she has supported from the moment her mother died. She is a very hard-working, earnest woman who has a great desire to get ahead. She has entrepreneurial vision. 

Despite her business presenting ups and downs over the two years, it has gone well for her, owing to that she has been able to deal with the acquired obligations. Her business is a stationery store. She counts on a healthy list of customers, thanks to the good treatment and form of payment that she provides to her customers, who are family members, neighbors, school children, and workers from different businesses and institutions in the community of Limón. 

She has obtained various loans from the Fundación and has always shown punctuality and responsibility. Now, she is requesting another loan to reinforce her store by purchasing women’s and men’s clothing for her store and so satisfy her customers and generate a higher income to improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as clothing.

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.ru: Гулнора родилась в 1976 году. Она живет вместе со своей семьей на севере Таджикистана. Гулнора мать двоих детей. Ее дети совершеннолетние.  Гулнора и ее муж Абдулло стараются для блага получения семьи. Ее муж строитель. Гулнора занимается собственным бизнесом более чем 12 лет. Она арендует столовую в средней школе. Гулнора готовит разные блюда и продает школьникам. Она одна введет этот бизнес. Гулнора запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки продуктов питания как овощи, зерновые культуры, масло, мясо и т.п. для увеличения оборотного капитала. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Gulnora was born in 1976.  She lives with her family in northern Tajikistan.  Gulnora is the mother of two grown children.  Gulnora and her husband, Abdullah, work hard for the good of their family.  Her husband is a builder.  Gulnora has been running her own business for more than 12 years.  She rents a kitchen in a high school and prepares and sells different dishes to the students.  She runs her business by herself.  Gulnora is asking for a loan of 5,000 TJS to purchase food products like vegetables, grain, butter, meat, etc to increase her working capital.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy food items as vegetables, grain, butter, and meat to increase her working capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay bills, transportation, food, promotional expenses, and to pay for pamphlets.

loans.name: Nhóm 11,minh Hùng,minh Lộc Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Dẹn works in agriculture raising oxen. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby oxen to raise and sell in future.

Dẹn is 26 years old and she is married with 1 child. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 11, Minh Hùng, Minh Lộc solidarity group, which consists of 5 members. 

This is Dẹn's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Dẹn has been involved in this business for 2 years.  One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profits, Dẹn hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to do well in school, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase more baby oxen to raise and sell in future

loans.name: Nhóm 02 Thôn Lý Nam Xã Thăng Bình Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hoa works in agriculture raising poultry. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in future.

Hoa is 36 years old and she is married with 2 children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 02 Thôn Lý Nam Xã Thăng Bình solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. 

In 2012, Hoa joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hoa has successfully repaid 1 loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Hoa has been involved in this business for 7 years. The main hardship that Hoa faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hoa hopes for her children to do well in school, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in future

loans.name: Nhóm 01 Thôn Lý Nam Xã Thăng Bình Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Nga works in agriculture raising poultry. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in future.

Nga is 40 years old and she is married with 2 children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 01 Thôn Lý Nam Xã Thăng Bình solidarity group, which consists of 4 members. 

In 2005, Nga joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Nga has successfully repaid 1 loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for 9 years. The main hardship that Nga faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Nga hopes for her children to do well in school, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in future

loans.name: Griselda Margarita

texts.es:
Griselda, elabora pupusas para vender y  así tener recursos económicos para aportar un poco  en cubrir las necesidades familiares, no cuenta con ayuda del extranjero, su negocio lo atiende todos los días de tres de la tarde a nueve de la noche, no tiene competencia. Griselda es casada, con su esposo tienen una hija de 22 años de edad, todos comparten la misma vivienda.
Invertirá en comprar pintura, mesas, sillas y una plancha nueva, de esta manera remodelara el local y aumentara la producción de pupusas, espera seguir manteniendo a sus clientes satisfechos, aumentar sus ventas e ingresos y poder pagar la deuda adquirida.
Su visión es mantenerse trabajando para dar a su hija el respaldo necesario para que finalice su carrera universitaria y mejorar las circunstancias familiares.
texts.en:
Griselda makes and sells “pupusas” (thick corn tortillas stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans). This is how she makes money to help provide for her family. She does not have any foreign aid supporting her. Her business is open every day from 3:00 pm to 9:00 pm, and she does not have any competition. Griselda is married, and lives with her husband and their 22 year old daughter. 

Griselda would use the loan to invest in buying paint, tables, chairs and a new griddle, so she can remodel her shop and increase the production of pupusas. She hopes to continue to keep her customers satisfied, and to increase her sales and income to repay the loan.
 
Her goal is to keep working to give her daughter the necessary support to finish her college career, and to improve the family’s circumstances.

loans.use: to buy paint, tables, chairs and a new griddle, so she can remodel her shop and increase the production of pupusas

loans.name: Nhóm 3 Giang Sơn - Hoằng Trường Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyên operates a food stall selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fish to resell.

Nguyên is 51 years old and she is married with 3 children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 3 Giang Sơn - Hoằng Trường solidarity group, which consists of 3 members.  Nguyên lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Nguyên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Nguyên has successfully repaid 4 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Nguyên has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Nguyên faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Nguyên hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to resell

loans.name: Ana Hilda

texts.es:
Ana, es soltera, vive con su madre, no tiene ayuda económica del extranjero, Ana  genera los ingresos para cubrir las necesidades de su hogar y lo hace atendiendo una cafetería todos los días, en su negocio ofrece pupusas, hot dogs, bebidas, golosinas y otros productos comestibles, su mayor ventaja es que no tiene competencia.
Requiere de un préstamo para comprar mesas, sillas, bebidas, aceite, harina, aderezos, etc., para brindar comodidad a sus clientes, elaborar la venta  de pupusas y otros. Espera mejorar su servicio hacia los clientes y la calidad de los productos, tiene mucha disponibilidad para seguir trabajando y mejorar su situación económica.
Su sueño es tener una mejor calidad de vida y seguir apoyando a su madre.
texts.en:
Ana is single. She lives with her mother. She doesn't receive any financial help from abroad. Ana makes an income to cover her home needs, and she does it taking care of a Café every day. In her business place she offers pupusas (stuffed tortillas), hot dogs, drinks, candy, and other groceries. Her biggest advantage is that she doesn't have any competition. 

She needs the loan to buy tables, chairs, drinks, oil, flour, seasoning, etc. She wants to offer her clients a more comfortable place. She wants to make and sell pupusas and other things.

She is hoping she can improve her service and the quality of her products. She is available to keep working and to improve her financial situation.
Her dream is to have a better quality of life, and keep supporting her mother.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, drinks, oil, flour, seasoning, etc. to offer her clients a more comfortable place, and to make  and sell pupusas (stuffed toritllas) and other things.

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es: María, ha mejorado su negocio con más variedad de productos para cubrir la demanda de sus clientes, esto ha sido posible gracias a la buena inversión del crédito anterior, comenta que dio mejor atención a sus clientes, sus ingresos han variado positivamente y ha cancelado sus deudas de una forma más fácil, sumado a ello la facilidad de pago que le brinda la institución hace que María se decida por solicitar un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de granos básicos, bebidas, huevos, aceite, pan, etc., para ofrecer un mejor inventario a sus clientes, seguir progresando y cambiando el estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Maria has improved her business with more variety of products in order to cover customer demand. This has been possible thanks to good investment of her previous loan. She comments that she gave more attention to her customers. The couples' incomes have improved and she has paid off her debts more easily. 

Added to this, the payment terms offered by this institution made Maria decide to request a new loan to invest in the purchase of basic grains, drinks, eggs, oil, bread, etc., to offer a better inventory to her customers, and to continue progressing and changing the style of family life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, drinks, eggs, oil, and bread, and to offer a better inventory to her customers, plus to continue progressing.

loans.name: Concepcion Del Rosario Yoselin

texts.es:
Concepción, tiene 27 años de edad, es parte de una familia integrada por su esposo de 31 años de edad y dos hijos de 8 y 7 años de edad; su negocio consiste compra y venta de ropa para caballero, dama y niño/a, ya cuenta con 4 años de dedicarse a dicha actividad, trabaja a tiempo completo en su negocio.
Utilizará el capital para comprar variedad de prendas de vestir para caballeros, damas y niños/as, le será de ayuda para renovar su inventario y atraer a nuevos clientes, espera que su negocio sea más competitivo, le genere mayores ganancias con las cuales cumplirá con sus diferentes compromisos.
Sus proyectos son tener un bazar en el que oferte diferentes productos, tener un local propio y brindar a sus hijos una buena educación para que en el futuro sean profesionales.
texts.en: Concepcion is 27 years old. She is part of a family formed by her 31 year old husband and two children, ages 8 and 7. Her business is the purchase and sale of clothing for men, women and children. She has already worked 4 years in this business and she works full time. She will use the capital to buy a variety of clothing items for men, ladies and children, that will help renew her inventory and attract new customers. She hopes her business will be more competitive and will generate bigger earnings so she can meet her different commitments. Her projects are to have a shop in which she can offer different products, to own her place, and to give her children a good education so they become professionals in the future.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing items for men, women and children to renew her inventory.

loans.name: Dildora

texts.ru: Дилдора родилась в 1985 году. Она родилась и выросла в семье простого фермера на севере Таджикистана. Дилдора после окончания средней школы не смогла поступить в университет. Она осталась без высшего образования. Дилдора после замужества начала свой бизнес скотоводством и шитьем женской одежды, так как ее муж имел маленький доход. Дилдора занимается скотоводством уже более 8 лет. Она откармливает коров и баран. Дилдора продает местным жителям молоко, мясо и шерсть. Она постепенно развевает свой бизнес и улучшает условию жизни. Ее дети еще маленькие. Она имеет 4 детей и данное время ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации. Дилдора планирует отремонтировать коровник и сарай и таким образом хочет улучшить условию проживания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Dildora was born in 1985.  She was born and raised in a family of a simple farmer in northern Tajikistan.  After finishing her secondary education, Dildora could not go to university, and was unable to get a higher education.  Because her husband makes only a small income, after her marriage Dildora started her own business raising cattle and sewing women's clothing.  Dildora has been working in animal husbandry for more than 8 years; she fattens cattle and sheep and sells milk, meat, and wool to the locals.  She has gradually developed her business and improved her quality of life.  She has 4 children who are still small.  Her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation.  Dildora plans to repair her cowshed and barn, and in this way hopes to improve her living conditions.  She is asking for a loan of 5000 TJS to purchase building materials.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy building materials to repair her cowshed

loans.name: Marjori Carolina

texts.es:
Marjori es una joven emprendedora, soltera, tiene 21 años de edad y vive en Calleria junto a sus abuelos.
Es el sostén de su familia, gracias al apoyo de sus abuelos está estudiando la carrera de Contabilidad y ahora quiere retribuir la ayuda recibida brindándoles apoyo a su familia. Actualmente trabaja como Asistente en la Municipalidad de la zona donde vive y le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, trabajadora, y con muchos deseos de superación.
Marjori está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar un vehículo para movilizarse a su trabajo y así ahorrar en pasajes, de esta manera seguirá desempeñándose como lo viene haciendo y más adelante poder convertirse en una gran profesional y apoyar a sus abuelos quienes la cuidaron desde pequeña.
texts.en: Marjori is a young enterprising woman. She is single, 21 years old and lives in Calleria with her grandparents. She is her family's support. Thanks to her grandparents' help she is studying Accounting and now she wants to reciprocate by giving support to her family. Currently she is working as an Assistant in the Municipality of the area where she lives, and she is doing very well because she is responsible, hardworking and with great desire to excel. Marjori is grateful to the Kiva lenders for their support. With it she will be able to buy a vehicle to go to work and in this way save money in transportation. This way she will be able to keep on working as she is doing now, and later become a great professional and support her grandparents who took care of her since she was little.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to go to work

loans.name: Nhóm 07, Thôn 09, Minh Khôi Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hiên works in agriculture, raising poultry. Hiên has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Hiên faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

Hiên is 39 years old, and she is married with two children.
 
In 2008,  Hiên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Hiên has successfully repaid six loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Hiên is the group leader of the Nhóm 07, Thôn 09, Minh Khôi solidarity group, which consists of three members. 
 
With her business profit,  Hiên hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to graduate from college.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Nhóm 04, Thôn 8,minh Khôi Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Ba works in agriculture, raising poultry. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future. Ba has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Ba faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Ba is 60 years old, and she is married with two children. Ba is the group leader of the Nhóm 04, Thôn 8, Minh Khôi solidarity group, which consists of four members. 

This is Ba's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Ba hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: 02030507004 Liên Hà- Hoằng Thanh Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Cúc works in agriculture, raising pigs. Cúc has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Cúc faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby pigs to raise and sell in the future.

Cúc is 54 years old, and she is married with three children. Cúc is the group leader of the 02030507004 Liên Hà- Hoằng Thanh solidarity group, which consists of four members. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2010, Cúc joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Cúc has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. With her business profit, Cúc hopes for her business to do well, for her children to find good jobs, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby pigs to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: 12-02-05 Chiến Thắng-Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Nga works in agriculture, raising poultry and pigs. Nga has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Nga faces in her business is the lack of capital. 

Nga is 36 years old, and she is married with three children. Nga lives with three dependents in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Nga joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Nga has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Nga is the group leader of the 12-02-05 Chiến Thắng-Quảng Tâm solidarity group, which consists of seven members. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry and pigs to raise and sell in the future.

With her business profit, Nga hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry and pigs to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: 12-01-04 Phú Qúy-Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Xuyến has a retail business selling salt, relish and dry food. Xuyến has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Xuyến faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Xuyến is 49 years old, and she is married with three children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents.

In 2013, Xuyến joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Xuyến has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Xuyến is the group leader of the 12-01-04 Phú Qúy-Quảng Tâm solidarity group, which consists of five members. She is applying for a loan to purchase more salt, relish and dry food to resell.

With her business profit, Xuyến hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more salt, relish and dry food to resell

loans.name: 09 Minh Hợp, Minh Lộc Group

texts.en:
Duyên is 27 years old and married with 2 children.  

Duyên operates a food stall/restaurant to sell fish. Duyên has been involved in this business for 3 years.

She requests a loan to purchase equipment to catch fish, shrimp, and frogs.  
One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.


In 2013, Duyên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Duyên has successfully repaid 4 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  She is the leader of the 09 Minh Hợp, Minh Lộc solidarity group, which consists of 7 members. 

Duyên hopes that her business will do well, her children twill do well in school, and her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase equipment to catch fish, shrimp and frogs.

loans.name: 12-03-01 Phố Môi-Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Văn has a retail business selling betel, betel nut and ghost money. Văn has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  She is applying for a loan to purchase more betel and betel nut to sell. 

Văn is 59 years old and  married with 3 children.  She is the leader of the 12-03-01 Phố Môi-Quảng Tâm solidarity group, which consists of 5 members. 
She lives and works in the city of Thanh Hoa which is an urban area in the Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Văn joined the Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Văn has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  The main hardship that Văn faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Văn hopes for her children to find a good job, her family to be healthy and happy, and her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase nuts and ghost money.

loans.name: 12-04-02 Thanh Tâm-Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Bình is 55 years old and married with 2 children.  Bình lives in the city of Thanh Hoa which is an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

Bình provides child care service and requests a loan to purchase more tools and devices for the child care service.  Bình has been involved in this business for 1 year.

Bình is the leader of the 12-04-02 Thanh Tâm-Quảng Tâm solidarity group, which consists of 5 members.  In 2013, Bình joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Bình has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Bình faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Bình hopes for her children to find a good job, her family to be healthy and happy, and to travel internationally.

loans.use: to purchase more tools and devices for a child care service.

loans.name: 11-01-02 Hậu Thành 2-Trường Thi Group

texts.en:
Duyên operates a food stall to sell rice. Duyên has been involved in this business for 10 years.  She requests a loan to purchase rice.

Duyên is 45 years old and  married with 2 children and 2 dependents.  She lives and works in the city of Thanh Hoa which is an urban area in the Thanh Hoa province.

Duyên is the leader of the 11-01-02 Hậu Thành 2-Trường Thi solidarity group, which consists of 6 members.   This is Duyên first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  The main business hardship that Duyên faces is the lack of capital.

In the future, Duyên hopes for her children to do well in school, her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice to sell.

loans.name: Shokirjon

texts.ru:
Шокирчон трудолюбивый сельский житель района Файзабад. В возрасте 32 лет он собирается открыть бизнес откорм-продажа скота. У него есть опыт в выращивании скотов, так как у них в хозяйстве имеются пару скотов для нужд семьи. Шокирчон женат и у него двое детей. Его жена домохозяйка, поэтому Шокирчон единственный добытчик в семье. Шокирчон уже запасся кормом для скотов, однако для купли самого скота у него недостаточно сбережений. Он обратился за кредитом, чтобы приобрести скот и начать свой бизнес. Шокирчон будет держать скот в своем большом старом сарае, продолжительность откорма скота по его словам будет составлять от 1 до 2-х месяца. 
Благодаря кредиту у Шокирчона и у его семьи будет источник дохода.
texts.en: Shokirjon is a hardworking villager in the region of Fayzabad.  Now 32 years old, he is trying to begin a business raising and selling cattle.  His family has a pair of cattle for their own needs, so he already has experience raising livestock.  Shokirjon is married and has two children.  His wife is a homemaker, so Shokirjon is the single earner in the family.  Shokirjon already has feed for cattle, but lacks the funds to buy the actual cattle.  He is asking for a loan in order to purchase livestock and start his business.  Shokirjon will keep the cattle in his own, large, old barn, and will fatten the cattle for 1-2 months.  Thanks to this loan, Shokirjon and his family will have a source of income.

loans.use: to purchase cattle in order to begin a business in animal husbandry

loans.name: Amelia

texts.es:
La Socia Amelia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de andamios meatlicos.la socia realiza trabajos como ventanas, puertas entre otras, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de andamios metalicos.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar materiales para hacer trabajos de andamios metálicos como metales, pinturas y clavos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Amelia is still continuing with her business buying, selling and renting out metal scaffolding. She does work on windows and doors, among others things. She has been in business for several years and it is going very well. Her dream is to expand her business selling metal scaffolding. The member is requesting a loan to buy materials necessary for the scaffolding jobs such as metals, paints, and nails. 

Amelia is grateful for the loan, and promises to make her installment payments in accordance with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy materials necessary for her scaffolding jobs, such as metals, paints, and nails.

loans.name: 12-02-06 Chiến Thắng-Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Thủy operates a food stall to sell fruit. She lives and works in the city of Thanh Hoa  which is an urban area in Thanh Hoa provinces.  She requests a loan to purchase  fruit to sell.

Thủy is 37 years old and married with 3 children and 3 dependents.  She lives and works in the city of Thanh Hoa which is an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

Thủy is the group leader of the 12-02-06 Chiến Thắng-Quảng Tâm solidarity group, which consists of 8 members.   In 2013, Thủy joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Thủy has successfully repaid 2 loans.  The main business hardship that Thủy faces is the lack of capital.

Thủy hopes her children to do well in school,her family stays healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit to sell.

loans.name: 12-03-03 Phố Môi-Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Vinh has a retail business to sell home products made from iron. Vinh has been involved in this business for 3 years.  She requests a loan to purchase more iron.  The main business  hardship that Vinh faces is the lack of capital.

Vinh is a 58-year-old  single woman with 3 children.  She lives and works in the city of Thanh Hoa which is an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

Vinh is the leader of the 12-03-03 Phố Môi-Quảng Tâm solidarity group, which consists of 8 members.   In 2013, Vinh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Vinh has successfully repaid 2 loans.

Vinh hopes that her children will find good jobs,  her family will remain healthy and happy, and to travel internationally.

loans.use: to purchase more iron to make home products.

loans.name: 12-01-05 Phú Qúy- Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Tâm raises poultry and pigs. Tâm has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  She requests a loan to purchase  poultry and pigs to raise and sell in the future.  The main business hardship that Tâm faces is the lack of capital.

Tâm is 40 years old and married with 3 children.  She lives and works in the city of Thanh Hoa which is in an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

Tâm is the leader of the 12-01-05 Phú Qúy- Quảng Tâm solidarity group, which consists of 5 members.  In 2013, Tâm joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Tâm has successfully repaid 2 loans.

Tâm hopes that her children will do well in school, her family remains healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more poultry and pigs to raise and sell.

loans.name: Nhóm 18 Thôn 5 - Quảng Nhân Group

texts.en:
Bốn raises poultry and cattle. Bốn  has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  She is applying for a loan to purchase  poultry and pigs to raise and sell.   The main business hardship that Bốn  faces is the lack of capital.

Bốn  is 43 years old and married with 3 children and 3 dependents.  She lives and works in the Hoang Hoa district which is a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province,

She is the leader of a 4-member group, the Nhóm 18 Thôn 5 - Quảng Nhân   solidarity group.   In 2010, Bốn  joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Bốn has successfully repaid 3 loans.

Bốn hopes that her family will stay healthy and happy, she will maintain  a successful business, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase poultry and pigs to raise and sell.

loans.name: 12-04-01 Thanh Tâm- Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Hải Yến earns an income cutting hair. Hải Yến has been involved in this business for 10 years.  She requests a loan to purchase equipment and furniture for hair salon.

Hải Yến is 34 years old and married with no children.  She lives and works in the city of Thanh Hoa city which is an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

She is the leader of a 4-member group, the 12-04-01 Thanh Tâm- Quảng Tâm solidarity group.  In 2013, Hải Yến joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Hải Yến has successfully repaid 2 loans.  The main business hardship that Hải Yến faces is the lack of capital.

Hải Yến hopes for her business to do well, her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for hair salon service.

loans.name: 12-02-04 Chiến Thắng - Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thanh has a business providing internet services. She is requesting a loan to purchase more computers and lines to widen the internet store.

Mrs. Thanh is 25 years old, and she is married with two children. She is the leader of a five-member group, the 12-02-04 Chiến Thắng - Quảng Tâm solidarity group. Mrs. Thanh and her business are in Thanh Hoa City, an urban center in Thanh Hoa Province.

In 2013, Mrs. Thanh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Mrs. Thanh has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Mrs. Thanh has been involved in this business for three years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is lack of capital.

With her business profits, Mrs. Thanh hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase more computers and lines to widen the internet store

loans.name: 12-02-01 Chiến Thắng- Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Hải Yến has a stall to sell fruit. She has been involved in this business for 10 years and requests a loan to purchase fruit to sell.

Cúc is 56 years old and married with 3 children.  She lives and works in the city of Thanh Hoa which is an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

She is the leader of a 4-member group, the 12-02-01 Chiến Thắng- Quảng Tâm solidarity group.   In 2013, Cúc joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Cúc has successfully repaid 2 loans.  The main business hardship that she faces is the lack of capital.

Cúc hopes for her children to find good jobs, her family to stay healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase  fruit.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make the payment for his car.

loans.name: Dalin

texts.en:
Aged 28 years old, Dalin is a married mother of two children living in a rural village of the Dambae district of Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. Both of her children are too young for school. Rice farming and cassava are the main sources of the family’s income. She has been in this business for 10 years. 

Dalin has been with VisionFund for one cycle, and she completely repaid the past loan, which has enabled her to better support her family and have some money. 

Now she is applying for another loan to pay for fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to grow her rice and cassava healthfully, and sell it for a good price to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland

loans.name: Maria Del Socorro

texts.es: Maria trabaja en nucleo educativo rural donde vive ,desempeñandose como maestra de educacion primaria con 25 años de laborar, es casada , no tiene hijos a su cargo. actualmente tiene la necesidad seguir mejorando su vivienda  por tal motivo visito a ceprodel un financiamiento el que lo utilizara en la comapra de masteriales de construccion tales como cemento,bloques, hierro, arena, zinc, perlin, puertas y pago de mano de obra y de esta manera tener mejores condiciones y nivel de vida en su hogar.
texts.en: Maria works in rural education where she lives, serving as a primary education teacher with 25 years of experience. She is married, and has no children. Currently she needs to continue improving her home, and for that reason she has requested a loan from CEPRODEL to buy construction materials such as cement blocks, iron, sand, galvanized steel, beams, and doors, and also to pay for labor. This way, she will have better conditions and living standards at home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as cement blocks, iron, sand, galvanized steel, beams, and doors, and also to pay for labor.

loans.name: Eng's Group

texts.en:
Eng, 57, lives with her husband and three children in a rural village of the Cheung Prey district, Cambodia. To feed the family, Eng and her husband earn a living as farmers who have been farming rice for 37 years, earning about 42,000KHR per day to spend for the family’s needs. To supplement the income, her husband also works as a paid construction worker. 

This is Eng’s group loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, and they are just with VisionFund for this cycle. Now she is leading her group ask for a loan. 

Eng is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for her family’s business. She hopes to increase her crop yields so as to generate more income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her family’s business

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
La vida le dio una oportunidad para trabajar como empleado de una tienda de consumos diarios.  Era lo que él esperaba, no sólo una puerta abierta sino lo que estaba detrás de esa puerta.
